      <origin>257458</origin>
      <model>wikitext</model>
      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="11563" sha1="fn1f9u1tgfs6wlz7rqdpsg4nos26m0g" xml:space="preserve">== Summary ==

=== A fairly light hearted romance around two girls based off of my actual AJ pets. Not the best written one, that’s a warning. ===

== Where many (academic) journeys begin: 1 ==
''“Take care Kitty.”'' My guardian told me as they gave a soft pat on my head before departing, they packed me some food, a tuna sandwich and some boiled eggs with a bottle of water. It’s a good enough meal, it’s my first day at Mythol High, looking back on it now, the name was kind of silly in a way. Either way, I was nervous. I could feel small drops of sweat under my fur but I shook my head and walked out the gates and followed the path.

It was a fairly short walk, my legs are used to walking a lot since my guardian takes me to a lot of places in jamaa so they didn’t hurt that much. The students here seemed pretty mature and cool to me, I think I could get used to this. I’m not sure actually.

Walking across the school grounds, the building seemed pretty high quality. Pretty nice building with a dark blue color scheme that was easy on the eyes, it’s not too fancy either, just fancy enough. I like it like that. The gold bits on the design was nice too. I think I should stop admiring the nice building now, I think I could try talking to the students since it doesn’t seem all too busy right now.

Someone catches my eyes tho..

== Pink and black butterflies: 2 ==
Dark grey scaled, light pink parts, a nice mohawk that fits well with her scales, she has some visible eyebags, a cute vest and pretty amber eyes and eyelashes, oh uh.. I think I- uh- Oh she’s looking at me- uh-

''“uh hey.”''

uh oh god what do I say, do, or- oh god oh zios oh mira oh- ack-

''“Are you ok..?”'' She asks me.

''“UH- yeah. I am. Hi, What’s your name..?”''

''“Fizzy, you?“''

''“I’m Kitty, it’s a basic name for a tabby, isn’t it?”''

''“I gues- oh, class. Well, bye.”'' That.. that went ok I think. Zios, that was.. an experience for sure. I got little bugs in my gut talking to her. I.. I wonder why. I think I should go to class. That girl was.. cool.

Well, this is gonna be my first class now. I should get going, I can’t get her off my mind even after we just met. Am I just obsessive?

== First class. Not that bad, really.: 3 ==
Walking through the school’s interior, it has that distinct perfume shop smell. Just a lot less sickly sweet. It really is that good. Well, gotta find my classroom now. Wait- wait I wasn’t told where my classroom was- uh- I think it’s.. “Ms. Redtail’s Cooking class”? The rooms got a sweet smell to it, like strawberry cake frosting, or muffins being baked. Let me just..

Walking into the room, it’s got a rather valentines-like feel to it. looks to have many animals cooking something. Cupcakes, strawberry cake like I mentioned, candies and other sweets, it’s a lot. The teacher who I assume is Ms. Redtail looks at me, seems to be an arctic wolf with swiss cherry fur with a patterned apron and a bow on her neck. Her tail has a fade to it.

''“Ah, Kitty! Welcome to class, I don’t mind if you’re late. You’re new after all, anyways.”'' She says, she has an almost motherly voice. ''“Everyone, that’s Kitty. Your new classmate. And she’d describe herself as..”'' uh- I’d describe myself as.. uhm..

''“I would describe myself as- uh.. me..?”'' Everyone looks at me quietly, actually, Fizzy’s in the class too! And.. she’s looking at me. She remembers our little chat.  ''“Well, if you’re too nervous, I don’t mind! I won’t force you. Everyone goes at their own pace. Now, take a seat over there.”'' Redtail tells me and points a paw to a seat next to the seat Fizzy is. Not sitting with her, just the person beside her table. She seems to be a labrador, designer dress, red collar and a little beret. Her collar looks similar to mine actually, just red. Must be the same designer who made them. She looks to be happy to have me sit next to her. She’s also already whisking something in a bowl.

''“Hey there! I’m patchpaw, you?”'' She says in an excited voice. ''“Kitty.”'' I reply. ''“Wanna be friends?”'' Asking to be friends this quickly? Uh, sure I guess. She doesn’t seem that bad and I don’t have much to lose. I distantly gaze at Fizzy from my seat while Patchpaw beats her tail on the chair in excitement as she nearly falls off the chair from leaning too far.

''“We’re making desserts today! I’ll be making some cake. You can help!”'' Hm, that explains the sweet smells coming from here. ''“Uh, Patchpaw? I’m not good at baking or just cooking in general so..” “That’s ok! You can still try!”'' Oh this won’t go well.

''“Here, Kitty! Try pouring the batter in the pan!”'' Handing the bowl into my paws, she expects me to pour it into the black pan on the table. ''“I think you should. I could accidentally spill a little.”'' Getting the tables dirty wouldn’t be good. ''“That’s ok! I can deal with it!”'' How.. exactly? ''“I like licking off the batter! Especially if it’s cookie dough. Taste good!”'' Oh uh.. that’s.. kind of.. weird. ''“Let’s get baking now, friend!”'' As she waits for me. I hold the bowl and pour it carefully into the rectangular pan and watch it all go in.

''“Great! Let’s get it in the oven now!”'' Taking the batter filled pan, I put it in the oven and close the door. Patchpaw sets it to25 minutes and looks at me happily. ''“You’re pretty good for the new girl!” “Thanks..”'' 

''“let’s talk a bit while we wait!”'' Uh, what’s the school like? ''“Oh it’s really cool! Cool people, cool teachers who aren’t mean, I like it here!”'' Sounds good. How about Redtail? She came off as pretty nice at first, but is she different actually? ''“She’s as sweet as she seems! She smells like strawberries!”'' She seems proper. ''“Also, you were talking to Fizzy, what did you think of her?”'' Uh, fizzy? She’s.. nice. She looks nice too. And she has nice eyes. ''“Oooh! Someone’s got a crush!”'' PATCHPAW DONT- don’t say that, please.. she’s sitting right next to-

''“What were you guys talking about? Crushes?”'' ohziosohziosohziosohzios OH MIRA- uhm, ''“she was-“'' I put a paw on Patchpaw’s mouth. ''“just- just shut up.” “Oh, okie dokie!”'' God. ''“Huh. Well, if you were talking about crushes, never really had one.”'' Then Fizzy turns and goes back to her seat. Peering over, she’s making donuts. Cream filled donuts.

''“you don’t wanna talk about your crush?” “Yes, I don’t. Not when uh.. someone’s right next to me.” “Ok!”'' Then I hear a “ding!” noise from below. It’s already been 25 minutes?

== Cakes, Donuts and pies: 4 ==
Taking out the fresh cake and placing it on the table, Patchpaw already has the light yellow frosting and she’s already spreading it on the cake which smells of vanilla and lemons. Seems to be a lemon cake. Tasty. I look over to Fizzy’s seat and she’s putting the chocolate frosting on her donuts, while the animal sitting with her seems to be waiting for their turn to fill the donuts.

After finishing frosting the cake, Patchpaw looks at me and gives me the coupler with white frosting, finished with the light yellow lemon frosting. ''“You decorate the cake! You can try it!”'' Uh, Patchpaw? I don’t think it would be a good idea, I wouldn’t do well. The oven was easy, not sure about decorations. ''“Oh, well, okie!”'' Taking the coupler from my paws, she pretty nicely decorates the cake with little drops of frosting on the cake’s top. I notice a bag of decorations also, stars, little balls, and heart shaped things are in it, taking it, I think this would be easy enough… actually, considering it now I think I could’ve done the frosting drops too. Oh well, too late now.

Dotting the decorations  a bit all over the place, but not without a bit of thought, I think the cake looks good enough. Looking at Fizzy’s table, her partners filling the donuts with cream now. I think everyone’s ready now.

''“Alright, students! Step off and place your sweet treats on my table for the rating!”'' Redtail speaks and the students get off their seats, Patchpaw carries the lemon cake and goes over to the table.

First was a rat and a mouse, their cupcakes were given a 7/10.

Second was a highland cow and a squirrel, their cookies were given a 6/10. Redtail mentioned they tasted a bit like qheat.

Third was a tasmanian devil and a mantis, their cheesecake was given a 9/10. Redtail liked how soft and delicate it was.

Fourth was Fizzy and her partner. she was given 9/10 too. Her donuts looked crispy and nice.

After the next two students had their treats rated, it came to us now. I was anticipating, and we placed the cake on the table. Redtail sniffs it and lightly smiles and cuts a piece, then takes a bite of the lemony cake. I hear an audible ‘mm!’ from her and I hear her say: ''“A solid 10/10! Great job you two!”'' And followed with a soft, approving smile and a nod. I could’ve sworn the tasmanian devil gave me a salty glare while his mantis friend looked like she couldn’t contain her anger. The rat, the cow, the mouse, and the squirrel didn’t really seem to mind. The cow seemed happy for me. So did Fizzy, something makes me wish Fizzy won tho.

''“Class dismissed my students! I’ll take my time cleaning the classroom.”'' Ms. Redtail says, and everyone starts to leave. ''“That was fun Kitty! We won!”'' Yeah, I guess. I notice fizzy coming, I think she’s friends with Patchpaw. ''“Hey Patch. And also Kitty, Nice win you got there.”'' My mouth has a slight coppery taste. I feel a light blush on my face, ''“Well, Kitty, Patch, I’ll be going. Again, you did good. Both of you.”'' Oh zios. ''“Hey Kitty! Did you know Fizzy’s my friend?”'' I think so now. ''“She tends to hang out with the music club, she’s good at guitar!”'' I think I like her more now. ''“But her friends don’t really like me. They kinda think I’m annoying but.. I’m trying to fit in!”'' Well, ok. It was a good lesson, I think I can go. Bye Patchpaw. As I wave her goodbye and walk off, she yells a ''“Bye!”.''

== Bevil and Molly: 5 ==
Patchpaw was kind of a lot for me, she’s nice but a bit energetic. I think I could see her as a friend. she’s friends with fizzy, but if I ever join her friend trio, I honestly wish Fizzy would spend more time with me then her or more attention to me. Wait, no, that’s just selfish, isn’t it? And attention seeking.. and not good.. and..

I hear a yell, i could make out a ''“HEADS UP KITTY KITTY!”'' And- OW-

''“Hah! I thought cats land on their feet Kitty Cat!”'' My head is spinning and I think I was tripped or hit across the head, rubbing my aching head I look up, the mantis from the cooking class who looked angry at me. Light blue hoodie, satin purple skirt under, she’s actually kind of pretty, but alas, she’s deceiving.

''“Nice one Molly!”'' The Tasmanian devil who was paired with the mantis cheers her on. ''“Thanks Bevil! Got the Kitty cat good!”'' They seem to be friends. A dubious little duo. ''“Smell ya later litter box!” “Yeah go win a sleeping competition first before you win cooking classes!”'' And they leave.

Wow, made first friends, then enemies. Really quick.

    <title>Blood Covered Fox. (Creepypasta)</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
    <id>162265</id>
    <revision>

      <parentid>257459</parentid>

      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="1591" sha1="atck4w2xcbn6da87ukk6ktdy9hk9u5p" xml:space="preserve">==Warning==
This may be gory! Read at your own risk.
==Story==
The blood covered fox is a normal fox, taking the appearance of any fox in the area, but gorier. It might have no face. No body. But the gory thing is.. it's always covered in blood. Sometimes it can have gvt$ spilling out.

There's ways to summon it. '''(REMEMBER THIS IS FAKE! DO NOT TRY THESE.)'''

1. Every person in the area HAS to be a fox. You then all make a circle while sleeping, with one non-fox player in the middle. They start chanting " Oh.. Bloody fox. Bloody fox. so my friends have fallen. Are they dead? Are they not? " One then gets up. "Bloody fox, bloody fox, my friend has woken. Will you save another?" another gets up, and until all of them are up keep saying it. Once all are up bloody fox should be somewhere.

2. Be alone in an area or den. Anywhere works. Be a wolf. Bloody fox hates wolves. Then say "Bloody fox do you recognise me? I guess you would, because you do hate me." Then wait 5 - 30 mins.

3. Make a masterpiece of bloody fox. Put it in an empty den. Needs to be yours.

Now, bloody fox does so much. It flashes up pictures of d€@d foxes and wolves, broken bones, gvt$, and much more gore. It can really. REALLY. Traumatize you. when seen, it will be eating any d€@d animal. Alphas aswell. If it's targeting you, it will be eating you when seen. And trust me. You don't wanna be targeted. Its horrible. You could get banned. 

One thing that shows you're safe is if it isn't eating. No animals, no alphas, nothing. Just blood.
[[Category:Gore]] [[Category:Horror]] [[Category:Untrue]]</text>

  <page>
    <title>User blog:Jammer8ztf8/Entity6666 creepy pasta</title>
    <ns>500</ns>
    <id>162267</id>
    <revision>
      <id>257491</id>
      <parentid>257490</parentid>
      <timestamp>2023-05-12T04:29:31Z</timestamp>
      <contributor>
        <username>Jammer8ztf8</username>
        <id>34294797</id>
      </contributor>
      <comment>I can’t put what I typed I. A creepy pasta page on here and I don’t know why just asking if somebody can please make it into a page</comment>
      <origin>257491</origin>
      <model>wikitext</model>
      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="5215" sha1="90vctajb6xpa8hrx2aob7ienmydvrbs" xml:space="preserve">Once upon a time, in the world of Animal Jam, there was a player named Entity6666. He was known to be a skilled hacker, and some even claimed that he had the power to control the game itself. Many players were afraid of him, and some even whispered that he was not a human, but an entity that had taken over the body of a player.

The rumors about Entity6666 only grew when he appeared in Null's Den, a dark and eerie place that was said to be haunted by unknown entities. Entity6666's wolf had an all-black fur with a red swirl pattern, and his eyes were white as snow. He never spoke, except in Morse code, which only added to his mysterious persona.

Some players claimed to have seen him teleport around the game, and others said that he could make their screens flicker and glitch with a single keystroke. But the most terrifying thing about Entity6666 was the fact that he seemed to be always watching, always aware of what was happening in the game.

One day, a group of players decided to investigate the rumors surrounding Entity6666. They followed him around the game, trying to communicate with him, but he remained silent, only responding in code. They tried to report him to the game administrators, but they found that Entity6666 seemed to have no player ID or history. It was as if he had appeared out of thin air, a true entity within the game.

As the group of players continued their investigation, they began to experience strange occurrences. Their screens would flicker, and they would hear strange noises that seemed to come from within the game itself. They soon realized that Entity6666 was not just a player, but something much more sinister.

The group of players eventually decided to leave the game, too afraid to continue playing with Entity6666 lurking in the shadows. But some say that he still remains, watching and waiting for his next victim. They say that if you ever come across him, you should run, for Entity6666 is not just a player, but an entity that has taken over the game itself. Rumors spread quickly among the Animal Jam community about the mysterious Entity6666. Some claimed that he was a ghost, while others believed he was a demon come to haunt the game. But the truth remained a mystery.

As time went on, more players reported encountering Entity6666. Some claimed that he had the power to control their accounts, while others said he had the ability to teleport players into Null's Den against their will.

Despite the growing fear and concern, the game administrators remained silent on the matter. They never acknowledged the existence of Entity6666, nor did they take any action to remove him from the game.

As a result, many players began to leave the game, fearful of encountering Entity6666. The once-thriving community of Animal Jam was slowly dwindling, and the game became a ghost town.

But the legend of Entity6666 lived on. Some players claimed to have seen his wolf lurking in the shadows of other games, while others swore that they had received messages from him outside of the game.

To this day, the true nature of Entity6666 remains a mystery. Some believe that he was a hacker, while others are convinced that he was something much more sinister. But one thing is for certain: those who encountered Entity6666 will never forget the fear and terror that he brought to the game of Animal Jam. Entity6666's reign of terror continued, and players were still afraid to encounter him in the game. One day, a player known only as "UrNext" received a message from Entity6666. The message spelled out "UrNext" using pillows in the background, which sent chills down UrNext's spine.

This was the last straw for the game administrators, who finally took action against Entity6666. They banned him from the game, and many players breathed a sigh of relief. But Entity6666 was not done yet.

He returned to the game under a new account, EntityReturns. His appearance was the same as before, with the all-black fur, red swirl pattern, and white eyes. This time, he was even more dangerous than before.

Players who encountered EntityReturns reported that he had the ability to teleport them to Null's Den, where they would be trapped and unable to escape. Some even claimed that he had the power to control their accounts and steal their items.

The game administrators tried to ban EntityReturns, but he always seemed to find a way back into the game. Some players even speculated that he had found a way to hack into the game's servers and bypass the bans.

As time went on, more players left the game, afraid to encounter EntityReturns. The game became a shadow of its former self, and the once-thriving community of Animal Jam was reduced to a handful of players.

To this day, EntityReturns remains a legend in the game of Animal Jam. Some players claim that he still lurks in the shadows, waiting for his next victim. Whether he is a hacker, a ghost, or something much more sinister, one thing is for certain: those who encounter EntityReturns will never forget the fear and terror that he brings to the game.

To any to see this please copy and pasta that in a creepy pasta it’s not letting me make  a page for it

      <text bytes="5154" sha1="lzeww40ka3fdoyk2joh4db4645vn2oc" xml:space="preserve">Once upon a time, in the world of Animal Jam, there was a player named Entity6666. He was known to be a skilled hacker, and some even claimed that he had the power to control the game itself. Many players were afraid of him, and some even whispered that he was not a human, but an entity that had taken over the body of a player.

The rumors about Entity6666 only grew when he appeared in Null's Den, a dark and eerie place that was said to be haunted by unknown entities. Entity6666's wolf had an all-black fur with a red swirl pattern, and his eyes were white as snow. He never spoke, except in Morse code, which only added to his mysterious persona.

Some players claimed to have seen him teleport around the game, and others said that he could make their screens flicker and glitch with a single keystroke. But the most terrifying thing about Entity6666 was the fact that he seemed to be always watching, always aware of what was happening in the game.

One day, a group of players decided to investigate the rumors surrounding Entity6666. They followed him around the game, trying to communicate with him, but he remained silent, only responding in code. They tried to report him to the game administrators, but they found that Entity6666 seemed to have no player ID or history. It was as if he had appeared out of thin air, a true entity within the game.

As the group of players continued their investigation, they began to experience strange occurrences. Their screens would flicker, and they would hear strange noises that seemed to come from within the game itself. They soon realized that Entity6666 was not just a player, but something much more sinister.

The group of players eventually decided to leave the game, too afraid to continue playing with Entity6666 lurking in the shadows. But some say that he still remains, watching and waiting for his next victim. They say that if you ever come across him, you should run, for Entity6666 is not just a player, but an entity that has taken over the game itself.Rumors spread quickly among the Animal Jam community about the mysterious Entity6666. Some claimed that he was a ghost, while others believed he was a demon come to haunt the game. But the truth remained a mystery.

As time went on, more players reported encountering Entity6666. Some claimed that he had the power to control their accounts, while others said he had the ability to teleport players into Null's Den against their will.

Despite the growing fear and concern, the game administrators remained silent on the matter. They never acknowledged the existence of Entity6666, nor did they take any action to remove him from the game.

As a result, many players began to leave the game, fearful of encountering Entity6666. The once-thriving community of Animal Jam was slowly dwindling, and the game became a ghost town.

But the legend of Entity6666 lived on. Some players claimed to have seen his wolf lurking in the shadows of other games, while others swore that they had received messages from him outside of the game.

To this day, the true nature of Entity6666 remains a mystery. Some believe that he was a hacker, while others are convinced that he was something much more sinister. But one thing is for certain: those who encountered Entity6666 will never forget the fear and terror that he brought to the game of Animal Jam.Entity6666's reign of terror continued, and players were still afraid to encounter him in the game. One day, a player known only as " Arcticskyz " received a message from Entity6666. The message spelled out "Ur next" using pillows in the background, which sent chills down  Arcticskyz  spine.

This was the last straw for the game administrators, who finally took action against Entity6666. They banned him from the game, and many players breathed a sigh of relief. But Entity6666 was not done yet.

He returned to the game under a new account, EntityReturns. His appearance was the same as before, with the all-black fur, red swirl pattern, and white eyes. This time, he was even more dangerous than before.

Players who encountered EntityReturns reported that he had the ability to teleport them to Null's Den, where they would be trapped and unable to escape. Some even claimed that he had the power to control their accounts and steal their items.

The game administrators tried to ban EntityReturns, but he always seemed to find a way back into the game. Some players even speculated that he had found a way to hack into the game's servers and bypass the bans.

As time went on, more players left the game, afraid to encounter EntityReturns. The game became a shadow of its former self, and the once-thriving community of Animal Jam was reduced to a handful of players.

To this day, EntityReturns remains a legend in the game of Animal Jam. Some players claim that he still lurks in the shadows, waiting for his next victim. Whether he is a hacker, a ghost, or something much more sinister, one thing is for certain: those who encounter EntityReturns will never forget the fear and terror that he brings to the game.

    <title>Like Wind</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
    <id>162274</id>
    <revision>
      <id>257564</id>
      <parentid>257558</parentid>

      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="5321" sha1="9p7h1886o5wfyovvl46evas1hi0vrc4" xml:space="preserve">[[File:Like Wind cover art.jpg|frameless]]

Written by XxAmberleaf

This is the first story in the Dark Shadows trilogy. This is my first long story on the wiki!

== Blurb ==
Flora is fed up.

She's been used to the life of a princess, where all anyone cares about is protecting her, and finding her a prince. But she knows it's not her.

When the strange Darkness that's been plaguing her country comes to her city, she finds herself getting strange nightmares about a pale fox who calls herself Sandy. Alongside this, she begins to have memories of her childhood, which the Alphas erased from her mind. She’s not who she thinks she is.

At first, she’s excited. This is her chance to escape the life she’s trapped in. But she didn’t expect the sacrifice along the way…

== The Characters ==
&lt;gallery&gt;
File:Flora from Dark Shadows.jpg|Flora
File:Honest from Dark Shadows.jpg|Honest
File:Airis from Dark Shadows.jpg
File:Snowy from Dark Shadows.jpg|Snowy
File:Rain from Dark Shadows.jpg|Rain
File:Lightning-Moon from Dark Shadows.jpg|Lightning-Moon
File:Emmi from Dark Shadows.jpg|Emmi
&lt;/gallery&gt;

== Prologue ==
There is a phantom portal hidden in the palace dungeons.

I know because I’ve been there, in secret, to train in the ways I’ve never been allowed to. 

It is only a temporal portal, not strong at all, and it serves as training to the royal guard. The dungeons haven’t been used in years so it was the perfect place for a little bit of darkness. Nobody can be injured past being knocked out for an hour. I am embarrassed to say that I have passed out before. The servants found me and I was locked inside my room for a week. 

They say it’s for my own safety, but I don’t want to be safe. For as long as I can remember all my thoughts are: Get revenge on the Phantoms. I don’t even know what for. But I know that I need to.

My name is Flora. I’m a fennec fox. I am one of Jamaa’s princesses, but although I’m the oldest, I know I’ll never become queen. I’m okay with that- perhaps pleased. I don’t have any true royal blood in me, so the throne will go to 17-year-old Snowy. 

I was brought to the palace by the Alphas when I was ten. I can’t remember any part of my life before that, though. I would be lying if I said that I was glad the Alphas took me here. I assure you, royalty is not all it’s cracked up to be. Yes, I have a small house as my bedroom; yes, I get to eat fancy banquets every day three times a day, but where’s the freedom?

== Chapter One ==
The first thing they try to drill into me is how fragile life is. Life is something that we should protect and nurture, It isn’t something that we should take for granted, and we had to be safe so that we could live long, peaceful lives and die old, due to natural causes.

But I say: what’s the point of life if you don’t live it to the full? Taking a deep breath, I leap of the edge of the boat.

We are on holiday at Crystal Springs- today we are taking a luxury cruse around Bahari Bay. I would prefer to be actually swimming in Bahari Bay, but oh well. 

Royalty never goes into saltwater- apparently it makes our fur matted. But I couldn’t care as it is more fun to fool around in the perfect waters.

But the best part was that I splashed Snowy as I messily enter the water. She squeals. I snort with laughter, and (childishly, I know), splash her more.

The difference between me and Snowy is, well, everything. She is a bunny, I a fennec fox. She is born into the royalty, but I am an orphan. And most importantly, she is your traditional textbook image of a princess. Nobody needs to tell you how I certainly am not.

“How dare you, Flora?!” She gasp. (Her handmaiden pats her dry.) “Have you no dignity?”

”None.” I laugh.

”I request that you get out of there, Your Majesty. You might catch a cold and die.” 

I snort. It is 40 degrees Celsius (around 100 degrees Fahrenheit) and the warmest day of the year so far. There is no chance of catching a cold in this weather, let alone a fatal one.) That’s Lightning-Moon, though, head of the Royal Guard, constantly fussing about one thing or another. It’s really exasperating. 

I dragged myself out of the water and shook myself dry. Snowy glares at me so I just smile innocently back at her, taking a seat on one of the fancy deckchairs. 10-year-old Airis and toddler Honest are gossiping about phantoms again.

”Is it true, that the royal guard had to fight off the phantoms before we left?” Honest says nervously, playing with her paws.

“Yes.” Airis leans over to hold his sister’s paw. “But that’s alright. The royal guard drove them back. They will protect us.”

”The royal guard is weak.” I couldn’t resist butting in. “The royal guard didn’t drive them back, we had to flee! The alphas are probably at our palace right now.”


''The battle was short yet bloodthirsty. The phantoms had surprised us just before we were heading off. I darted to my wardrobe-that-could-fit-a-bed and rummaged through bows upon bows upon laces upon laces to find the boomseed launcher backpack that I normally kept hidden. I used it in the portal and in case of an emergency, like today. I loaded it and darted towards the servant’s door, knowing that I’d be stopped if I went out the main door.''</text>

    <title>A Lost Jammer</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
    <id>162283</id>
    <revision>
      <id>257555</id>
      <parentid>257554</parentid>
      <timestamp>2023-05-28T23:11:25Z</timestamp>
      <contributor>
        <username>SuperTapirWoman</username>
        <id>51711888</id>
      </contributor>
      <origin>257555</origin>
      <model>wikitext</model>
      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="4906" sha1="79fmq46p9160ocjlq7wttlzpf2238p3" xml:space="preserve">[[Category:Horror]]
[[File:Old lostie.png|thumb]]
This story is about the lost jammer’s orgin. It’s not a Creepypasta, since it’s not told from first person.

== The Story ==
There was once a jammer named Fman122. He was known for hacking, which was against ToS. Fman122 planned of taking over the world using his skills. Why? Fman122 had good ideas of saving Jamaa, but people would never listen. This made him mad. Fman122 went off to see the phantom king for hacking tips. The phantom king accepted his request and began training with him. This took about 3 years. After his training, Fman122 was ready to come back and take over. Many jammers started to get hacked using a jam-a-gram signal. A wolf named ILoveBlackberries3153 was noticing this, and wanted to stop it. 

“I am going to Fman122, I’m gonna stop him.” Blackberries stated everywhere he went, on an endless journey to find Fman122. Many jammers were worried, what was gonna happened? Would Blackberries get hacked? Echoes of conversation and worries filled Jamaa. “He might get hacked, he can get naive at times.” “Wish you luck, you’ll need it.” “Mommy, will cousin be safe?” “We will meet again, some sunny day….” It was making Blackberries uncomfortable. On a cold, chilly night at Mt. Shiver, Blackberries found the phantom portal. He took a step inside, just as a purple bolt shot up his leg. “Ouch!” Blackberries said, jolting away. Snow covered his snout, his blood jumping up and down inside there. ''No, Blackberries, you can do this!'' He got up, shook off the snow, and took a step. Then, Blackberries jumped in.

He fell onto a dusty, purple track. Blackberries shook his head as he got up. “BLURBY SLURPY!” “EOOOBABLE” “BABLEEOOOO” Phantom sounds came from all around. The grass was black, and several burnt trees with green lava leaking from inside and hanging on branches could be seen. It was eerie. Blackberries trotted on the track, which was a long road covered by burnt trees with green and purple goo rubbed against their branches. He looked around, worried. He trotted for about a hour, until he stopped for some peace and quiet. Blackberries got onto a purple bench with black stands and armrests, one piece was dangling from the one he sat one. As soon as he laid down, a screech came from above, and all his sight went black.

He woke up to find a black wolf with a fiery red flame pattern, a white underbelly, and two solid red eyes, staring into his soul. They were in a pitch black room, with only one greenish light standing above them. “Ahh, isn’t it my new friend?” The wolf laughed, grabbing his chin. He moved it like a ventriloquist moving a puppet’s mouth. “Your Fman?” Blackberries asked, recognizing the face from a poster. “The one and only!” the wolf answered, slowly losing his comedic tone into a slithery tone. “Oh, well, can you stop hacking?” Blackberries asked again. Fman dropped Blackberries’ jaw and sat in front of him. “I won’t stop hacking.” he said. “Please stop. Two of my friends got hacked by you already.” Blackberries said, his voice raising a bit. “Were they: ClubPenguinFan3 and CricketCoolCrickets?” Fman laughed, getting off the floor.

”Yes, they were!” Blackberries yelled furiously. “Should’ve said bye-bye to them, you’re going down too.” Fman answered, his claws being unsheathed. “I’m not, you are!” Blackberries yelled, pouncing on Fman. “Only if you obey me, you’ll live.” Fman said, shaking Blackberries off. “Fine.” he said. Fman smiled, suddenly, Blackberries was mind-controlled, or it felt like it. Years passed, and already Blackberries was a hacker. He was known by the name of the lost jammer, due to him being lost. Blackberries furiously hacked other players, until the control of Fman. One day, Fman came up to The Lost Jammer. “I want you to hack the alphas, put them into phantoms. If you’re caught, I’ll avenge you.” The Lost Jammer nodded, typing in so many codes. He had 60 members of Wildworks banned, logging into their accounts and saying offensive things to get them banned. There was no stopping him.

Then a bang came as soon as he got into the code. Jammers came in with trained pet phantoms to kill Fman and the Lost Jammer. The Lost Jammer exited the code part and started to ban all players in the den. He quietly said their names. “Cookiesprinkes123OMG, Sonicfan102, Pufferdish9999999…” Nearly all the jammers were banned, but it was too late. Fman was dead. “No!” the Lost Jammer cried. “My…my, mentor!” He burst into tears, the droplets hitting strands of Fman’s fur. The Lost Jammer grieved for him, until the next year, he got an idea.

The Lost Jammer slid into the mantle of Fman’s place. Now, he was Fman. To this day, The Lost Jammer roams Jamaa, looking for the nest victim.
[[Category:Untrue]]</text>

      <text bytes="1475" sha1="rfyy28ulidxd2qdsqlmza7209etrojp" xml:space="preserve">{{Character idk|title1=Mother of Cetras|age=1000+ &lt;small&gt;(chronologically)&lt;/small&gt;|height=??|species=Cetra|status=Alive|residence=Cetratic Realm|alignment=Neutral|relatives=Cetras|allies=??|enemies=??|image1=Cetra.jpg|gender=Female}}

The '''Mother of Cetras''' is the ruler of the Cetra race. 

== History ==
The mother of Cetras is a divine being that is widely believed to have been the first Cetra and is the "queen," or ruler of the Cetra race.  

== Appearance ==
The Mother of Cetras is a tall woman with a ghostly white complexion and white eyes. She has long white hair that is slightly messy in the front and tied into a braid with two blue horns coming out from the sides of her head. She also is seen with a white, long fluffy tail that sticks out of her lower back.

The Mother of Cetras dons a white kimono with blue decals and white geta sandals.  

== Personality ==
Little is known about her personality. However, she is described to be a rather quiet and nit-picky individual, and does not tolerate any kind of disrespect shown or directed towards her or her subjects.

== Abilities ==
'''Overall Abilities:''' Though most of her abilities are not explained, The Mother of Cetras is the most powerful Cetra out of all of her kind. Being the progenitor of the subhuman-like specie,

'''Crystalization:''' As a Cetra, The Mother Of Cetra's is able to crystalize herself and her subjects.

      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="4387" sha1="ryrdsjxhasi1bsm2uvq0jn588v1obg9" xml:space="preserve">&lt;blockquote&gt;'''''Indulge in a tale in which a criminal organization struggles to remain afloat with a self-centered leader, along with the government being only one step closer to finally catching them'''''&lt;/blockquote&gt;&lt;blockquote&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;

=== Prologue ===
A crisp, chilly breeze blew across the reeds in the early spring morning. Frost glittered on the edges of the grass as a slender black snow leopard speckled with green spirals padded across the riverbank. He appeared to have rather fancy attire, a fedora and a green bow tie.  It was still only the beginning of spring and while warmer weather had started to roll in, the cold of the prior winter still lingered, especially in the mornings just after sunrise. The lone leopard had chosen to go off alone, split apart from his normal duties he was assigned to as he so often did these days. He found that he much preferred the solitude over being with his co-workers, given he already felt so distant from them.

“Terrence!”

He whirled around, snarling as he came face to face with his own leader. He realized his mistake, and quickly apologized with a respectful dip of his head. The gray snow leopard didn’t seem too fazed, instead laying his tail on his shoulder to try calming him down. Red had similar clothing, a red fedora and bow tie, which matched his red markings. “I was ''gonna'' tell you about the party we were gonna have today. Y’know, escaping from the government’s grip yet again.” 

Terrence blinked a little. “''A party?”'' he echoed, his yellow eyes narrowed in confusion. “Sir, you know we can’t just throw around our mon-“

”Relax, mate! What happened to you that made you hate fun?” he replied flippantly, flicking his tail. It was a natural habit of his, Red never really took things seriously, and usually flicked his tail when he wasn’t taking anything seriously. “Look, you know you’re second in line for leadership and all that junk, so how about you enjoy your time before it’s all back to paperwork and heists?” he said, loosening up a little more. 

Terrence took a deep, shuddering breath to calm his nerves. “Alright… fine. I’ll try.” He finally agreed, wrapping his tail around his paws. Red let out a victorious chuckle, beginning to turn. 

“Party’s at twelve!” he exclaimed as he left. Soon enough, Terrence could barely see his shadow over the hill, the sun beaming in his direction. He was worried about how much money they were spending. He felt awful for even trying to deny his leader. Another part of him whispered in his ear, telling him that he was second in line, it was his job to make sure the organization stayed afloat. 

Finally, Terrence picked himself up and headed back to the headquarters, hoping that the shadows would keep the building nothing but a secret, along with all the crimes that would surely send him to a ''far, far'' different place if he were to die.

=== '''Chapter One (WIP, DO NOT EDIT.)''' ===
A large bunny bounded through the desolate forest, it’s breath hitched in its throat. Breathing heavily, it turned to look behind it. A shark-hyena mix was chasing it, rapidly gaining up. This was its chance. The bunny skidded to a stop, quickly maneuvering itself sideways. It searched its military uniform for the switchblade safely in its grasp, and expertly knocked the hyena over. Standing over his target, Charles let out a victorious chuckle. “Fifth time in a row I beat ya, and I gotta say, that’s pretty embarrassing, Switchblade.”

“Funny for you to talk.” Switchblade objected, vaulting to his feet. “Especially with that stupid punk pilot hat you’re so proud of.” He added bitterly, his orca tail lashing in annoyance. 

Charles just hummed and nodded, deflecting the insult. He did that a lot. Walking past the hyena, he began to make his way toward camp. The forest felt infinite around them, trees towering above them. The sun glared down at them from the early daylight, making shade a priority for them. He brought his attention purely towards getting back, and wouldn’t do anything else until he had this goal done. It was a bad habit of his, but he always thought it was a better way to get things done then letting them pile up.

    <title>Fēng Xu</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
    <id>162295</id>
    <revision>

      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="7955" sha1="c9pfogaahem06ukpvgf7ej5qb71rcqn" xml:space="preserve">'''Thank you so much xxayoaprilxx for the drawing!'''{{Character idk|title1=Fēng Xu|age=14|height=5'6|species=Wind Demon &lt;small&gt;(implied)&lt;/small&gt;|status=Alive|alignment=Good|relatives=Unnamed Mother&lt;br&gt;Unnamed Father|enemies=Crow Watanabe, Akuji Hasegawa, Ashton Khanh &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt;|nickname=Windy &lt;small&gt;(By Nabi)&lt;/small&gt;|residence=Misterin &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt;|allies=Locaster Helios, Yuna Hanamura, Shay Hanamura, Nabi Haluška, Shizuka Ikami &lt;small&gt;(neutral)&lt;/small&gt; Hideko Inazuma, Ashton Khanh &lt;small&gt;(neutral)&lt;/small&gt; Veena Lu, Hikage Ishuko, Soul Kawasaki|image1=&lt;gallery&gt;
Feng 2.jpeg|Drawing
Feng.jpeg|Gacha Club
Animal Jaam.png|Animal Jam
&lt;/gallery&gt;|gender=Female|Ethnicity=Chinese 🇨🇳}}

'''Fēng Xu,''' sometimes referred to as '''Fēng Hsu,''' is one of the many supporting characters in A Good Vs. Evil Roleplay. She is affiliated with Locaster's group and the current owner of the wind gem that once belonged to the wind founding demon, Aeris, and the second youngest shard user out of all the characters.

== History ==
Fēng was primarily raised in a middle class area in Misterin and lived a fairly simple life with her parents. However, when she was five, she had caught a high fever and underwent treatment intensely. Unfortunately, she had went blind due to the severity of the fever. It had started off as having blurry vision, but eventually had total vision lost. 

At a young age, Fēng was mostly sheltered for a good portion of her life because she was seen as fragile due to her blindness and was often kept inside her home due to the fear that she would get hurt or be incapable of taking care of herself. She was pulled out of school and had to learn how to read braille. Eventually, her parents had found a shard of a gem that was able to assist her in seeing and crafted a staff with the shard in the center.  

When receiving the staff, the shard allowed her to see through it and acted as her vision. She was eventually not as sheltered as before due to her adapting to using her staff and was allowed to finally be outside and do day-to-day things to help her parents. Shortly after, Fēng discovered that the gem on the staff had wind powers and started to experiment with the magic that the shard held and was able to quickly use the powers to defend herself, but hid the powers from her parents. 

Fēng was one of Crow Watanabe's targets during the height of him being a shard thief, but due to her being blind and needing the gem, he had spared her life and did not take her shard from her. After some months, she was discovered by Soul Kawasaki in a forest and was recruited to become apart of Locaster's group, and then discovers that her shard was one of the demon gems that was owned by Aeris, the wind founding demon. She immediately became friends With Nabi Haluška due to them sharing similar interests and being in the same age range. Locaster describes them both as being inseparable, not leaving ones side in any moment, even in dire situations.   

== Appearance ==

=== Gacha Club Model ===
Fēng is a petite girl standing around 5'6 with pale skin and white eyes. She has medium length silver hair tied into a bun and wears a white flower crown on the top of her head.

Fēng's attire consists of a gray shirt with dark gray cuffs at the end and a gray skirt to match with a cloak that covers most of her body, white stockings and white boots with gray outlining on the top. She is mostly seen holding her staff, which is brown and has the wind gem in the middle. 

=== Animal Jam Model ===
Fēng's Animal Jam Model is a fox that has a white upper fur and a beige underbelly with white eyes and light gray patterns. She wears a white flower crown, A black long spiked collar with an epic alpha staff with a white crystal on the side of her hip. Around her wrists are black elf tail bracelets and on her tail is a spirit tail armor. 

== Personality ==
Initially, Fēng was seen to be a rather shy and reclusive individual. She often remained quiet and had a disdain for speaking to others because of how she was sheltered for a portion of her life. She frequently had trouble with talking to others, let alone socializing with others around her and can get overwhelmed when presented with too much attention drawn to her and suffers from panic attacks whenever those moments occur. She remained socially awkward for awhile and could only hold up basic conversations but not exactly talk to anyone sufficiently.        

After she was recruited in Locaster's group, Fēng experiences a drastic personality change and becomes slightly more social with the other members, but still remains meek when attempting to speak to others on a more deeper and personal level. She enjoys to tease her aquaintances in a playful manner and has a soft spot for white rabbits, admitting the reason why is because of her pet rabbit back at Misterin that her parents now take care of due to her being out of the kingdom.       

Fēng is shown to be adaptable, being able to adapt to any setting rather quickly, as when the group had to stay in the dark forest for the night, most of them had problems with adjusting while she was able to adapt to the environment around her. Fēng is not a very socially aware individual, having a hard time picking up social cues and signals from others and can have a hard time understanding obscene humor or basic jokes for that matter. Because of this, Fēng is a sensitive individual and can react to jokes that she finds crude or insensitive.            

Despite her naturally quiet and inept disposition, when in combat, Fēng gains a more hardened, serious persona, often trying to protect her friends from danger, as seen when she blocks an attack from a Lyakonian soldier being directed at Nabi. Her personality further shifts in combat, becoming more sharp-tongued and a little brash as Ashton would describe.            

== Abilities ==
'''Overall Abilities:''' As the youngest shard user, Fēng is a very powerful magic user and combatant. Despite not having much muscle in her body to do larger scale attacks, Fēng combines her physical strength with her shard in order to make up for it. Instead of using up most of her physical strength, Fēng opts to using partial of her wind powers in order to quickly ambush and knock down her targets with powerful wind blasts.    

'''Enhanced Speed &amp; Reflexes:''' Fēng possesses superhuman-like speed, slipping away from Misaya's ghost arms and quickly dashing off. With her speed also comes her reflexes, as she was able to evade the Lyakonian soldier's gunshots with only minor injuries and effortlessly dodges both Cassian and Akuji's attacks, only coming back with minor injuries afterwards. Despite not being the fastest, she was able to out-pace Ashton in a race when they were residing in the Northern Forests.      

'''Enhanced Strength:''' Despite her being one of the more shorter members, Fēng has exemplified to possess demon-like strength, being able to knock down many Lyakonian soldiers in a mere second and nearly go head on with Cassian during their escape from Lyakon and outsmarting him in order to run away from him. She is capable of also lifting u a broken down tree that had fallen during their escape from Lyakon.        

'''Enhanced Stamina &amp; Endurance:''' Fēng has shown to possess inhuman-like stamina &amp; endurance. She was able to chase after Crow when he started to run away and did not express any exhaustion, remaining in optimal physical and emotional shape. Her stamina is high enough to a point where she was able to hop across many tree branches in high trees without having to hesitate or get tired.          

'''Tactical Intellect:''' Studying the demon gems and Demonian, Fēng is an exceptionally clever and resourceful individual.

      <text bytes="19930" sha1="prfsh20tzpzsztq6trglgymm15axlek" xml:space="preserve">'''Thank you so much KettKatt for the drawing!'''{{Character idk|title1=Cassian Packard|nickname=Cassi &lt;small&gt;(By Akuji)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Bastard &lt;small&gt;(By Ashton)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Packard &lt;small&gt;(By Everyone)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Commander Packard&lt;small&gt; (Formal: By Everyone)&lt;/small&gt;|age=29|height=6'1|species=Human|status=Alive|job=Commander in the National Army of Lyakon|residence=Isya, Lyakon|alignment=Evil|allies=Akuji Hasegawa, King of Lyakon, National Army of Lyakon, Ashton Khanh &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt;|enemies=Locaster Helios , Hideko Inazuma, Shizuka Ikami, Hikage Ishuko, Yuna Hanamura, Shay Hanamura, Vivian Veena Lu, Nabi Haluška, Fēng Xu, Ashton Khanh|image1=&lt;gallery&gt;
Cassi poo.jpeg|Drawing
Cassian Gacha.jpeg|Gacha Club
Cassian Aj.png|Animal Jam
&lt;/gallery&gt;|gender=Male|Ethnicity=Kazakh &amp; Greek 🇰🇿 🇬🇷|relatives=Aslan Adylet &lt;small&gt;(father, deceased)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Lenore Packard &lt;small&gt;(mother)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Six unnamed siblings}}

'''Cassian Adylet Packard''' is one of the central antagonists in a Good Vs Evil Roleplay. He is the commander of the National Army of Lyakon, often being portrayed as a strict ruler with soldiers that serve directly under his name. He is often referred to as being one of the youngest commanders in his fleet and one of the most enhanced in his division.  

== History ==
Cassian was the oldest of six siblings and lived in a more sustainable area of Lyakon. He was the son of Aslan Adylet, a Kazakh general, and Lenore Packard, a Greek conductor. Cassian had a close relationship with his father and often trained with him when he was off duty, giving him a passion for combat and fighting. At some point in his life, Cassian's father had died because of a landmine explosion when he was overseas, being alerted via a telegram. He was also gifted his opal earrings that were recovered from his body after the accident. This event had changed his personality from a kind, yet tough individual to being quick-to-anger and incredibly violent.  

After multiple expulsions from school due to getting into a handful of physical conflicts, Cassian was sent to juvenile camp for two years because of his behavior, but was eventually released early due to cleaning up his act. To avoid getting into more conflict and to follow his father's footsteps, he joined the army when he was thirteen in order to discipline himself and quickly rose above the ranks before becoming a commander at fourteen. 

Cassian is listed as being the youngest commander by both the king and many of the royal soldiers, being not only the youngest but the most enhanced because of his past training with his father. He is often sent out on missions on the kings behalf and exhibited charisma, leadership and also showing to be an incredibly intelligent man who was able to lead their army into victory, defeating many high ranking militaries that were sent to fight them and defeated them all due to his excellent coordination skills.       

Cassian has also trained [[Akuji Hasegawa]], but has implied to have abused him when he was a soldier in training, being rather harsh with him and degraded him for not giving a well than exemplar performance and caused their relationship with one another to sour. Though, after four years, the both of them were on an even playing field, despite their flaws and problems with one another.      

Cassian first appears after Akuji and the Lyakonian soldiers had tracked down Locaster's group in order to turn Ashton in. He was the odd signal that Yuna had detected during the groups heinous battle with the soldiers. He quickly fired his gun at Locaster before he had ducked and evaded the attack. The both of them had engaged in a fight before getting kicked off and fought by Damion, nearly overpowering him because of Damion existing long before he did, but quickly punched him down and pursued after Locaster.        

While he pursued Locaster, many other soldiers followed and he ordered them to tire out all the demons and shard users as much as possible in order to put them in a vulnerable position. As the soldiers were following his orders, Cassian spots Locaster and slams him down to the ground, holding him by the neck. After he blasts Cassian off, the two have a one-on-one. Locaster was confused because of how he appeared and was rather intimidated by his aura, but also did not know who he was.           

== Appearance ==

=== Gacha Club Model ===
Cassian is a tall, pale man of Kazakh and Greek descent with raven black hair tied into a braid and white eyes with black, star-like patterns in them. According to Ashton, on the side of his neck is a supposed bite mark.  

Cassian is often seen wearing a black trench-coat with a dark gray bodysuit-like shirt underneath and light gray sweat pants; Around his waist is a lighter gray belt, and sports opal, ovular earrings with silver lining on the outside. His gloves in his drawing are black, though in his Gacha Club Model, they are shown to be white. On the side of his waist is a gun holder that has a double barrel gun on the inside.  

=== Animal Jam Model ===
Cassian's Animal Jam Model is a Arctic Wolf with a black outer fur and a paler inner fur with white eyes and star patterns. He sports  a dark gray trench-coat with black buttons, a black long spiked collar around his neck and two opal earrings with silver lining. Around his tail are tail belts with light blue buckles and black huntress boots with light blue buckles on the side.

== Personality ==
Being the commander for one of the largest armies, Cassian is a strict and disciplined individual, though is seen as a reasonable figure of authority by the soldiers that work under his name. He often has a stoic nature and expresses little to no remorse or emotions when on or off duty and is often seen with a straight, monotone face while speaking a slightly expressive tone. A ruthless man, Cassian has demonstrated to be merciless and often kills people in cold blood with little to no regret, perceiving the people he murders as as nothing but targets for him, including people he has to capture. he is described by his trainees as both dead calm, yet incredibly intimidating; his presence alone is able to stir up fear in even the bravest individuals because of how high his position is and how intense his strength and abilities are.     

Though, despite his stoic and intimidating deposition, Cassian has shown to be quick to anger and often resorts to physical or verbal violence when a soldier cocks up during battle or training, leading to rather strained relationships with the people he works with, as seen when he had punched Akuji in the gut for befriending a hybrid. However, Cassian has shown devoted loyalty towards the king and Lyakon, being the kings right-hand man and speaking in a considerably softer tone while being rather intimidated but fascinated by his presence. Because of his devoted loyalty, he is sometimes perceived as an extremist in a political sense, thinking that only one individual should hold the power from the people and is often in extreme support for any of his kingdoms actions, even if they stir up controversy in Azuren, Lyakon's nemesis.    

Cassian has demonstrated to have a warped view of justice. He perceives justice depending on what side he sets on, thus explaining his implied abuse towards Akuji. With Lyakon's justice system being corrupt, he often follows what his kingdom thinks ideologically. He is mainly described as not having a mind of his own and is constantly believing what the kingdom believes and not having his own set of beliefs, as Ashton describes Cassian as "nothing but a brainless commander" because he believes what the others believe and works as the kings commander, further fueling his point about him not having a mind of his own.       

Being the youngest in his fleet, Cassian has demonstrated to be mature and does not talk much unless he is engaging in combat. He is usually cautious with his words and his choice of words are described as meticulous, yet intimidating when speaking. He has been shown to be fluent in many languages, mainly Kazakh, Russian, and English, but has a difficult time pronouncing some english words with "r" as he has a difficult time pronouncing "information" or any other word that is similar. Cassian has a disdain for people teasing him, such as when Akuji calls him by "Cassi," a nickname his father called him as a child, but does not retaliate due to Akuji being the right-hand man and frequently faces threats if he attempts to get physical with Akuji.          

However, he is also cautious when doing ground work, and is sometimes described as overly paranoid when even setting foot on dirt. Due to his father dying from a land-mine accident, Cassian has a fear of stepping on one and ending up in the same condition his father had by dying. His fear of land-mines causes him to become extremely vulnerable because he did not want to end up like his father and have his mother and siblings grieving over him. Akuji often taunts him for this fear, making him visibly more vulnerable and shaken up when a land-mine is ever mentioned.           

Losing his father at a young age, he has demonstrated to miss having a father figure in his life, clinging to any figure of authority around him to feel a sense of love inside of his heart. He's protective if the paternal figures he has in his life and would often go as far in saying he would die for any of them because of his immense thought of his father dying after he stepped on a land mine. He is often teased for his paranoia by Akuji to an extent where he nearly punched him into a tree, demonstrating that his paranoia is great enough to extend into physical violence.            

Cassian is protective of both his soldiers and the earrings that he wears. Because of the earrings being the only item he has left of his father, he chooses to protect them more than himself, one time taking a bullet to the arm to solely protect his earrings. Though he sees people as only living targets, he still does everything he could to protect his soldiers in order to not get in quarrels with the king; Cassian strives for perfection from his soldiers because of how he would get into an argument if any of the soldiers had died under his wing. His obsession with perfection is shown with his moments when he trained Akuji, where he becomes arbitrarily more harsh and abusive since he could not reach the pinnacle the soldiers were expected to achieve.              

== Abilities ==
'''Overall Abilites:''' Being trained by his father and enlisting in the National Army at a young age, Cassian has shown to possess extreme strength and power at his age. Being the youngest commander in his fleet, he has demonstrated to be a danger to both Locaster's group and any other army. As he is the youngest commander, he is mostly underestimated due to his age. Even though Cassian is one of the youngest commanders in his fleet, he demonstrates to possess an extreme amount of strength that surpasses the older commanders in the other fleets, often being referred to as one of the king's best commander.     

'''Enhanced Speed &amp; Reflexes :''' Cassian has proved to be an incredibly fast individual. He was able to quickly ambush and slam down Locaster into the ground without difficulty. It is noted by Ashton that Cassian's reaction times match the caliber of speed and reaction to that of a demon. With his fast reactions, he manages to both run at a fast ace while using his explosives and his gun. With his speed, his reflexes are equally as fast and was able to evade incoming attacks from both Ashton and Damion, despite the both of them being highly advanced  in military combat, with Ashton being a soldier and Damion previously being a lieutenant colonel.            

'''Enhanced Strength:''' Being the youngest commander in his fleet and previously being trained by his father, Cassian possesses strength that nearly matches the caliber of a demons, quickly knocking down Locaster after ambushing him and kicking down Ashton without any difficulty. Even with the efforts of both Damion and Shay combined, Cassian managed to quickly overpower them with a simple punch.             

'''Enhanced Durability:''' Cassian possesses enhanced durability and has an exceptionally durable body, being able to withstand many of Yuna's poisons that she assimilated into his body. His durability is also shown when Locaster used his shadow vines in order to try and pierce him and had difficulty doing so, as he had to get Ashton to assist him shortly after.             

'''Enhanced Agility:''' Cassian has shown to be very quick and agile, being able to pass through a lush forest effortlessly and evading both Locaster and Yuna's attacks. When fighting, Cassian often relies on his speed and sometimes his acrobatic movements in order to deliver an attack or ambush another individual. His agility had surprised Nabi and the rest of the group members due to having trouble with keeping up with his moves.             

'''Enhanced Stamina &amp; Endurance:''' As a commander, Cassian has shown to have both high stamina and endurance, mainly due to being under harsh training for around thirteen years. He was able to stay up once after being attacked by multiple sword stabs and lightning strikes, only coming back with minor injuries. This is shown in his small encounter with Locaster when the two of them had went head on, which despite all of his injuries, manages to stay up without having to rest or be healed.             

'''Keen Intellect:''' Cassian possesses an incredible amount of knowledge on both combat and warfare. He has been described by the other commanders as extremely erudite and clever, utilizing his weapons and planning out the next attack in a matter of seconds without having to lose his composure. Being educated by many tutors from the kingdom and his father, he is able to sense if people are in an area minutes after stepping onto the ground, being able to locate Locaster within a matter of seconds.               

'''Bilingual:''' Coming from Kazakh and Greek origin, Cassian has demonstrated to be bilingual, speaking all Russian, Kazakh, and English effortlessly. Though, he has a difficult time pronouncing some english words with the letter "r." Cassian has also been seen speaking Greek, but he cannot speak it well due to his Kazakh accent. He mainly speaks a combination of Russian and Kazakh but speaks English when engaging in battle or in normal conversations between him and his soldiers.               

== Equipment ==
'''Double Barreled Shotgun:''' Cassian harbors a double barreled shotgun, which he uses in order to shoot down targets from afar. Because he was never fond of using a sword, he opted for a gun because of his experience with handling firearms better than he can with melee weapons.                 

'''Miniature Grenades:''' Cassian possesses miniature grenades that have the capability of creating massive explosions that can cause immense damage. He carries them mainly in his coat pockets and uses them when having to chase down Locaster by throwing them in potential areas where he would have been able to escape.                  

== Weaknesses ==
'''Landmines:''' Though Cassian is suited to be in more dangerous missions, he has shown to have a severe fear and paranoia of landmines. This is shown when having to adjust onto the forest grounds and taking careful steps whenever running because of his fear of ending up like his father had due to him stepping on a landmine overseas and dying. Because of his fear of landmines, some of his abilities get hindered greatly all due to a fear he has.  

== Relationships ==

=== [[Akuji Hasegawa]] ===
Akuji was one of Cassian's many trainees and was ordered to train him under his wing when he was fourteen. Cassian proves to have a seething hatred towards Akuji, abusing him for not giving an exemplar performance and often demanded beyond perfection from him. When he proved to be a capable soldier, Cassian allowed Akuji to work with him under his wing when he grew older, but Akuji exemplifies insensitive behavior towards Cassian, calling him by the nickname "Cassi," despite him not wanting to be called by that nickname and also teasing him for his fear of landmines and his fathers death. Due to Akuji being the king's right hand man, he cannot retaliate with physical violence towards him out of fear of being penalized. 

Akuji shows a remote liking towards Cassian, but only does so to see his reaction whenever taunting him, ripping off his earring once and making him fight for him to give it back before Cassian nearly smothered him. He demonstrates his dislike by punching him in the gut in private or using physical violence to warp fear into him when they are not on kingdom grounds. He often yearns for Akuji to someday die due to his cruel and lecherous behavior towards him, but often keeps his thoughts in private out of fear of Akuji ever knowing them. 

Cassian also harbors an immense amount of hatred for Akuji solely due to him making remarks about his dead father in a more crude manner, often causing him to lash out to an extent where he will get physical with Akuji.   

=== [[Ashton Khanh]] ===
Most of Cassian's interactions with Ashton are limited, as the two never interacted with one another. Though, Ashton did work in Cassian's fleet and demonstrated to have a somewhat decent relationship with him, despite Cassian's cruel nature. He was often praised by Cassian more than he had praised Akuji, something Akuji later points out during their fight to get Ashton back to Lyakon. Yet, despite his praise for him, he holds an immense grudge against Ashton for betraying Lyakon and leaving the kingdom. 

Cassian perceives Ashton in a neutral light, not seeing him as an entirely terrible person, but not seeing him as a good one either. His neutrality on him is further proven when he would not take his side of the story and only does what the kingdom ever so thinks. 

=== [[Locaster Helios]] ===
Locaster and Cassian's interactions are limited. However, when the both of them meet during the battle against the Lyakonian soldiers, he has shown to be impressed with Locaster's magical abilities and combats, being genuinely delighted when going up against him but still maintaining his harsh, cold disposition. Locaster has shown to be fearful of him because of his menacing aura and how he was able to send a fear strong enough to let his guard down.  

=== [[Damion Halloreen]] ===
The interactions between Damion and Cassian are also limited. However, when Damion came to protect Locaster in a hugging embrace position, Cassian lowered his guard due to how he was protecting his son made him reminisce about him and his father. Their relationship gave a sense of envy inside of Cassian because of how his father was still alive and his was not. He perceived Damion and his son as him and his father when he was younger.  

== Trivia ==

* Cassian is also one of the many characters who does not like British people, alongside Ashton. Though, Ashton displays a hatred for them, Cassian seems to tolerate them to an extent. 
* Cassian is also one of the many characters who's hair is tied into a braid, the others being [[Akuji Hasegawa]], [[Misaya Myat]], and the Founding Demon, Shizuko. 
* Despite having a mother who is a conductor, he never learned how to play an instrument and does not excel at playing any for that matter.
* Cassian's favorite foods are Shelpek, curry rice and manti, but dislikes anything that contains fish, with the exceptions being salmon and tuna.
* Despite Akuji mostly working with him, Cassian shows to have a sense of hostility around him.

    <title>File:Illyria.png</title>
    <ns>6</ns>
    <id>162319</id>
    <revision>
      <id>257875</id>

      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="1913" sha1="86xfqoumklxj49xpaevh09bzqhk4am8" xml:space="preserve">== Damn. I Didn't Know Rock-Bottom Had a Basement. ==
Hi {{Username}}, I'm Galaxy, and I'm a sleep-deprived writer who is totally mentally stable and does not belong in an asylum. I go by any pronouns.

I've technically been using this wiki for a while on my old account, but I moved here as of 2023, upon reaching 1k edits. Anyways, I won't really be active here anymore, but I'll still come back every once in a while, comment on posts, see what's new, and check if this place has revived itself (impossible challenge). 

Also, please don't go hunting for my old stories from when I was, what, 10?, because I will literally eat your vital organs. 

---  

With that being said, I have to thank all my old wiki friends for the great memories I've made from this place. This is where I first truly started enjoying the craft of writing, where I learned to be inclusive and respectful, where I learned to take criticism. This is where I spent my time during the pandemic, and actually made some friends during those times when I was stuck at home and my mental health went down faster than the global economy. 

--- 

If you have questions about the wiki or writing, want to ask for general life help (be warned: I have dollar-store advice ready and waiting to throw at you like a sack of wet mice) or just want someone to talk to, you can do so on my message board. You can also find me in the server Discord by the same name.

Thank you for making it this far down the page and I apologise for wasting your time with my horrible sense of humour. All of you guys are beautiful humans who do not deserve the world for the cold, cruel place it is (unless you're yet another piece of crap, in which case, please take it). I wish you all a great day, wherever you may live.



'''''!!'' DNI''' TRASH: transphobic, racist, ableist, sexist, homophobic, etc., and other people who can go step on Legos and get wet socks.</text>

  <page>
    <title>Nabi Haluška</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
    <id>162323</id>
    <revision>
      <id>258554</id>
      <parentid>258400</parentid>
      <timestamp>2023-08-18T18:51:40Z</timestamp>
