      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="10273" sha1="i9sawr6k8vcfx5quqzy15awhv2apncp" xml:space="preserve">'''Thank you so much to Doggiezaj for the drawing!'''{{Character idk|title1=Nabi Haluška|nickname=Butterfly Lady &lt;small&gt;(by Ashton)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Bug Girl &lt;small&gt;(By Ashton &amp; Shizuka)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Lady Butterfly &lt;small&gt;(By Hideko)&lt;/small&gt;|age=13|height=5'6|species=Human|gender=Female|Ethnicity=Romani, Korean &amp; Peruvian 💙‍☸️‍💚 🇰🇷 🇵🇪|status=Alive|job=Florist &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Medical assistant|residence=Esako, Elveria|affiliation=Elverian Medical Unit|alignment=Good|relatives=Unnamed Mother&lt;br&gt;Unnamed Father|allies=Locaster Helios, Ashton Khanh &lt;small&gt;(Neutral)&lt;/small&gt;, Shay Hanamura, Yuna Hanamura, Fēng Xu, Veena Lu, Hikage Ishuko, Hideko Inazuma, Shizuka Ikami &lt;small&gt;(Neutral)&lt;/small&gt;|enemies=Akuji Hasegawa, Crow "Hanako" Watanabe, Cassian Packard, Ashton Khanh &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt; Shizuka Ikami &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt;|image1=&lt;gallery&gt;
Nabi yet again because it didnt work last time.png|Drawing
Nabi cutie.png|Animal Jam
&lt;/gallery&gt;}}

'''Nabi Haluška''' is a major supporting character in a Good Vs. Evil Roleplay. She is affiliated with [[Locaster Helios|Locaster's]] group and is the wielder of the insect shard, and is the youngest shard user out of all of the other users, with [[Fēng Xu|Fēng]], who is the second youngest shard user in the group. 

== History ==
Nabi is the daughter of an Elverian medical officer who often assisted him in the medical field, though before she was a florist when working with her mother. As she was trained to be a medical assistant, she was often away with her father and spent less time with her mother, though the both of them still had a strong relationship. However, as time started to pass, her mother had fallen ill and it left her unable to not function properly. As a result, Nabi decided to stay home to assist her mother while learning how to take care of herself. 

As her mother's illness began to worsen, Nabi had missed school in order to take care of her mother while her father was away, knowing that she will grow worse without any care. Due to her father's job, he was busy to an extent where he would not see his family in months. Her mother had remained bedridden after the illness had began to take over parts of her body, making it difficult for her to do basic tasks and as a result, Nabi managed to take care of her and made sure she was doing well. 

One day when her father came home, he had brought Nabi two purple gemstones back after he was away due to assisting soldiers in the medical tents. He had retrieved them from a nearby cave when going to fetch water, and gave them to Nabi as a token of appreciation, and apologized for not being there to help her. Because of her mother's sickness, he retired from his job and tended to his wife, with Nabi returning to school the following day. 

Nabi had taken the shards and placed them on a helmet she crafted when she was younger, and decided to wear it because of how the color of the shards made it stand out. However, she soon began to notice that her shards would attract insects and other creatures like spiders. She also recalled having small spiderwebs grow on her hands before learning how to control her powers. Seeing that the shards on her helmet had such unique abilities, Nabi begun to practice with trying to maintain her abilities. 

== Appearance ==

=== Drawing ===
Nabi is a young girl with a slender build and tan complexion with mute red lips. She has light purple eyes with long, brown hair that extends to her upper back with purple highlights present internally. 

Nabi wears a bird-like helmet that has two large insect shards attached on the side, aswell as a black cloak wrapped around her body. She also sported a black spiked necklace that had silver spikes around it. She wears light purple armor with various flower designs, mute purple military sweatpants and light purple boots with darker laces. She sometimes carries a medical box incase of an emergency. 

=== Animal Jam Model ===
Nabi's Animal Jam Model is a fox with a purple outer fur and tan underbelly. She has light purple eyes and flower patterns all over her fur. 

Nabi's attire is similar to that of her drawing counterpart: She dons an epic feathered helmet with a black cloak wrapping around her body. She wears a black spiked collar that wraps around her neck. Nabi also sports a blackout diamond encrusted tail and hunter boots. 

== Personality ==
Nabi has been described by her peers as energetic and lively, yet spunky and always looking for adventure and has an interest in medicine and machines. Being the daughter of a medical officer and florist, she has shown to excel in both the medical and floral field, being able to tend to Ashton's wounds after Cassian had punched him in the face when being thrown in Lyakon's prison. She often has a sharp mouth, usually saying things that are considered rather surprising considering her age and frequently teases members of the group in a playful manner. With her playfulness, Nabi is described to be a very kind and comedic girl, having the ability to keep the mood up with a few simple jokes.  

Being the youngest shard user, Nabi has demonstrated to be responsible with using her powers, though she sometimes relies on them too much. She improves this by using her physical capabilities more than her magic, keeping them both at an equal balance to the best of her ability. She is prone to falling ill if being separated from her shards for too long and often has to keep her helmet on at all times or having to keep one of her shards near her, something that Nabi has a strong dislike of doing. She can at times be stubborn, refusing to change sides or her mind for the sake of her friends and is persistent in doing so.     

Despite being thirteen, Nabi has demonstrated to be an excellent fighter and acts rather brash and headstrong when in combat while also possessing leadership skills when doing so, ordering everyone in the group to split up to fight the Lyakonian soldiers when they were discovered. She can appear as both hot-blooded and rather abrasive, oftentimes losing her temper because of insults made at her or her friends and is quick to come to their defense at any moment. She has also proven that she too is an excellent coordinator with the assistance of Locaster and Shay.                   

== Abilities ==
'''Overall Abilities:''' As the youngest shard user in the group, Nabi has shown to be an extremely talented and powerful fighter. Despite being the shortest member of the group and not having much strength, she manages to make up for it by using her insect-like abilities in order to assist her during battles. She was able to swiftly out-pace many of the Lyakonian soldiers and nearly went one on one with Akuji, but had quickly backed down due to him running after Ashton instead after he was sent to help Nabi with taking down more of the soldiers. With her previous knowledge as a medical officer, she has proven to be one of the best healers in the group, right besides [[Yuna Hanamura|Yuna]] and [[Cherry Amana|Cherry]].    

'''Enhanced Speed &amp; Reflexes:''' Nabi is extremely fast, being able to vanish within a blink of an eye when running away from enemies or soldiers. She was able to out-pace Akuji and his fleet of soldiers effortlessly and quickly climbing on a tree in order to use her powers to get everyone away from the soldiers, and has the capability of attacking them before they can register what happened. Her rather superhuman-like speed caught the eyes of Ashton, witnessing her unleash dozen of strikes onto them and has been described to be the third fastest member in the group.     

'''Enhanced Strength:''' Despite not being the strongest, Nabi has demonstrated to have incredible strength, as proven when she was able to pick up Fēng and carry her on her back when in the rain for a little while and managing to nearly punch Akuji, almost landing a hit but was thrown off of him after. She was able to take down many soldiers with a simple punch or kick and also dragging Crow across the ground after he returns again.       

'''Enhanced Durability:'''  Being in the medical unit and working in harsh conditions, Nabi's body has proven to be incredibly durable: She exemplifies this when being able to work through her overuse of her shards magic and having her arm nearly cut off. She was able to keep fighting despite her injury.        

'''Enhanced Stamina &amp; Endurance:''' Nabi possesses enhanced stamina and endurance, almost never getting tired and being able to stay in the same shape when fighting. In their battle with Crow after he returns, she managed to continue fighting him despite all the injuries she had received and landed many injuries on him, leaving him surprised despite having the power of The Dark Entity. She managed to hold off Akuji for a brief amount of time before he switched targets.          

'''Insect Communication:''' As an insect shard user, Nabi is able to communicate with the insects around her, allowing her to command them to do what she desires. She is seen communicating with a spider to quickly alert the others spiders to make a large web in order to trap some of the black vines in to prevent them from spreading further to the port. She has also proven to get along with insects well, regardless of how poisonous or dangerous they may seem.          

'''Keen Intellect:''' Nabi possesses a vast amount on knowledge in medicine, insects and the demon gems. During the battle to escape Lyakon, she was able to calculate how many soldiers would have been coming at them and devised a plan to evacuate them from the castle. She has also proven to know where every kingdom is due to remembering their coordinates, leading the group to Misterin in order to claim asylum from Lyakon, who held them in custody.           

== Magic Abilities ==
'''Insect Manipulation:''' Nabi is able to manipulate insects in any form she desires. She is able to summon many of them in the palm of her hand to call for them, along with being able to spawn insects inside of a person based on her internal emotions.

      <text bytes="961" sha1="t3calm2qm64o3cfzvfrjk9fi0loehg8" xml:space="preserve">Once, i was playing animal jam play wild, you know just trading and such. everything was normal until a jammer walked up to me and asked will you be my friend? I felt bad because they were new so i buddied them and then they started spam sending me jags that read: "come to my den!" i went to there den and then i noticed there avatar was bloody with that red splosh pattern. there username was a new jammer and now it had become leftalone1. i was scared, so I logged off. when i logged back on it said incorrect password so I checked the parent tools and it was changed to a weird random line of numbers, it was like 434325345345 or something like that. I never saw leftalone1 until one day a random jammer named sad182 kept spamming jags that read: "come to my den!" this was clearly an alt account of leftalone1. nothing weird happened after that.

    <title>Cherry Amana</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
    <id>162344</id>
    <revision>

      <text bytes="19974" sha1="ebs75vbgltgtyv6cr1mfpszzptmpgt5" xml:space="preserve">{{Character idk|title1=Cherry Amana|image1=&lt;gallery&gt;
Cherry the coolest.jpeg|Gacha Club
Cherry black sun.jpeg|Black Sun Attire
Cherry again.jpeg|Animal Jam
&lt;/gallery&gt;|nickname=Cherry-bomb &lt;small&gt;(By Ashton)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Cereza &lt;small&gt;(Alternate name)&lt;/small&gt;|age=19|height=5'5|species=Human|gender=Female|Ethnicity=Polish &amp; Latvian 🇵🇱🇱🇻|status=Alive|job=None|residence=Dawnbloom Village &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt;|affiliation=Team Voltage &lt;small&gt;(disbanded)&lt;/small&gt;|alignment=Good|relatives=Luna Amana &lt;small&gt;(mother, deceased)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Windflower Amana &lt;small&gt;(younger sister)&lt;/small&gt;&lt;br&gt;Kazimieras "Kazi" Easton &lt;small&gt;(father)&lt;/small&gt;|allies=Locaster Helios, Yuna Hanamura, Shay Hanamura, Vivian "Veena" Lu, Hikage Ishuko, Soul Kawasaki, Nabi Haluška, Fēng Xu, Ashton Khanh &lt;small&gt;(neutral)&lt;/small&gt;, Shizuka Ikami &lt;small&gt;(neutral)&lt;/small&gt;, Hideko Inazuma &lt;small&gt;(neutral)&lt;/small&gt; Damion Halloreen|enemies=Crow Watanabe, Black Sun, Akuji Hasegawa, Cassian Packard, Lilyflower Amana &lt;small&gt;(Windflower’s corrupt counterpart)&lt;/small&gt;, Max &lt;small&gt;(Bolt’s corrupt counterpart)&lt;/small&gt;}}

''This page belongs to Aminaheart, and is currently being worked on. Please do not edit this page without her permission. Template done by Auryze.''

'''Cherry Amana''' is a major supporting character in a Good vs Evil Roleplay. She is a spellcaster and healer in training. She and her sister had to escape from their village after the Black Sun attacked it, forcing them into hiding in order for them not to get found and captured. She’s currently on an ongoing quest with her friend Locaster and his friends to make the demon gems whole again before the black vines destroy Azuren.
== &lt;big&gt;History&lt;/big&gt; ==
Cherry was the eldest daughter of Luna Amana, the finest archer in their home of Dawnbloom Village. She never got to meet her father ever since she was born, and her mother kept telling her that he left the family, showing little to no care for him. At a young age, Cherry was very interested in herbs and healing, even watching other people doing magic during a spell class. 

Cherry was, as Luna would describe, an eager and kind child who wanted to learn new things. She noted that her sister was her whole world, wanting to protect her no matter what the circumstances were. However, Cherry was also shy and rather timid, not wanting to be the center of attention for a prolonged period of time. Noticing her rather shy demeanor, Luna decided to teach Cherry the basics of healing magic and became proficient at it. Cherry decided to secretly watch spell classes through the window to learn how to do spells because of her shyness. 

Cherry eventually learned how to shrink objects and do basic healing, practicing every moment she got and became proficient at it. She also taught her sister, Windflower, a little of what she knew. One day, Cherry noticed how Windflower was practicing using a sword, and decided to help her by using a shrinking spell to shrink the sword to a good size for them. She even managed to customize the swords for the two of them, their names in Latin engraved in the blade of the swords.  

Cherry would start to practice sword fighting in the training room with Windflower for days at a time and found an enjoyment practicing with her sister. One night, cherry noticed that her mother was sneaking out of her bedroom and saw her telling Windflower about something. She did get caught, and later on found out that their father was evil after he left the family. 

Cherry also tried to spend time with Luna as well, begging her to show her how she would shoot targets using her bow. This led to her learning how to use the basics of a bow, but in fighting combat she would mainly use her sword. She also tried to ask about what happened to their father multiple times, with Luna telling her over and over that he just left the family. This left Cherry feeling frustrated, not knowing what actually happened to her father.

However, things started to take a drastic turn when the Black Sun, a terrorist military group, invaded Dawnbloom Village in the early hours of the morning. Cherry was forced to flee, along with her sister, but were attacked by a Black Sun soldier. Luna managed to defend them, and after a lot of back and forth, told Cherry and Windflower to run from the village and never look back. Cherry didn’t want to leave her mother behind, but listened to Luna as they ran from the only place they called home. She never saw her mother again after that, leaving her with some form of regret, wondering what would happen if she stayed and helped her fight.

When she was seven years old, Cherry was forced to hide from the Black Sun for the rest of her childhood. She would practice using the spells she knew and look for new herbs and plants when the soldiers were not patrolling the area. She and Wind both had very little amounts of gold from their rushed escape, only buying food when they had the chance to. Cherry, at one point, even tried testing plants if they were edible. This went on for many years until she woke up one day to realize her sister was gone. This made her panic, her first thought being if the Black Sun captured Windflower. She spent multiple days and months looking for her sister while hiding from the Black Sun to avoid being captured.

One day, Cherry realized that her sister was in a special group, Team Voltage, a group who fights against any evil forces and saves people from harm. She was finally found by none other than her sister Windflower and after an awkward introduction, was allowed to join the group, becoming their next healer in place of Windflower. 

She went on many many missions with the group, one of them involving a realm where her sister had an evil counterpart named Lily. But, the leader of the group, Bolt, one day disbanded the team after there was a huge argument between everyone in the group. This forced Cherry, Windflower, Soul, and Locaster to isolate themselves from the Black Sun as they slowly tried to take over the world.

== Appearance ==
(Note: This character has two appearances; An Animal Jam model, and a Gacha Club model. The Gacha CLub model is supposed to give a more accurate sense of what they would look like as a person, and not in Animal Jam. The Animal Jam model and the Gacha Club model are used to show them both in Animal Jam and as an actual person)

=== Gacha Club Model ===
Cherry is a young adult who is around 5’5, making her the shortest out of everyone in the group. She has pale skin with cherry red hair in a braid, and teal eyes. 

Being a spellcaster, she carries two small pouches around her waist full of her herb supplies. She  has a book that explains some of the herbs she has seen and what they do.

Her normal outfit includes a dark raspberry top and skirt with dark red highlights. She also wears a scarf hiding the necklace she made with her sister Windflower when they were little kids. Cherry also wore two hair clips in her hair to keep her bangs in place. She wore high knee white and raspberry boots.

=== Black Sun Outfit ===
During her imprisonment in the Black Sun by Shizuka Ikami, she wore a black and gray uniform similar to her normal attire. However, on her top there was a heavy piece of armor as a chest piece, and had a long sleeved shirt with gloves. Also, she wore gray leggings under her skirt to cover up her legs. Cherry was also forced to take off her hair clips and was stripped of her necklace, replacing her scarf with a short black one. 

=== Animal Jam Model ===
Cherry’s animal jam mode is a cerise coloured wolf with a white underbelly and white fire markings. Her usual attire has her carrying a sword on her back, along with wearing a red ribbon scarf around her neck and a dark red butterfly in her hair.

== Personality ==
As a child, Cherry was extremely shy towards the other villagers and children, not knowing what to say and scared about what they would think of her. But, she also had a kind heart. After learning the basics of healing magic, she would try to heal injured animals that she saw while out hunting for herbs in the nearby forest. That would sometimes lead her to get attacked. She also was suspicious of her mother for a while since she thought she was hiding something from her and Windflower. 

After Luna’s sacrifice and her escaping the village, Cherry's personality started to shift from a shy and kind girl to a more traumatized and paranoid one because of her mother's sacrifice. She started to become mature at a young age, teaching how to fend for herself and her sister, but also became overly cautious. As the Black Sun was still looking for them, she often had a paranoia that the Black Sun would eventually track her and her sister down, leading to her protective demeanor she has now over Windflower. 

In the present, Cherry is a rather protective and slightly hostile individual, protecting her sister and often acts defensive when talking about people she’s close with. She has shown this when Veena was talking about how Cherry was overprotective with her sister, and she argued back saying that she was doing it ever since she lost her mother years ago. Yet, despite her stubborn demeanor, she shows to have a more kind and caring side towards her friends. She tries her best to help all her friends in the group since she was a healer, but it sometimes leads to her making impulsive decisions. 

== Abilities ==
'''Herb Intellect:''' Out of everyone (except Yuna), she knows which herbs to use for spells and which are for healing. However, this doesn’t mean she knows what every single herb in the world is, she only knows which ones she has seen before or has used in a spell.

'''Enhanced Speed &amp; Reflexes:''' Despite being captured by the Black Sun, it did help her with her fighting skills. When Cherry gets really mad about one of her enemies badly hurting her sister or friends, her speed and reflexes increases. This is only activated when she gets really angry. It only goes away once she calms down, but there’s a chance for her to become reckless and not think about strategy at all when this happens.

'''Enhanced Strength:''' Cherry has shown to have a lot more strength in doing spells and while in a fight. She can last much longer while holding a spell than her sister. She has also shown to be able to throw people a few metres away from her, like when she fought the guards while helping her friends escape from [[Akuji Hasegawa]] and [[Cassian Packard]]. However, she does still get weak from overuse. 
== Magic Abilities ==
'''Healing:''' Cherry is able to heal wounds using her magic. So far in her training she can heal scrapes, cuts, and deep wounds depending on their size. The larger the wound, the more focus it takes and longer it takes to heal completely. She can also heal anyone in a certain radius if she concentrates hard enough.

'''Spirit magic:''' After a conversation with Locaster about her magic reacting to the darkness vines, the two of them made a theory that her healing magic might be combined with spirit magic. She was told that a piece of the wind gem plus healing magic created spirit magic. Cherry tried multiple times to try to destroy the darkness vine that Polaris had in a jar, but failed. It was only until the darkness vine morphed into a big breathing plant that she finally was able to use her magic to destroy it, However, this is a big risk because it takes up almost all of her energy, depending on the size of the darkness root.  

'''Potion making:''' Cherry has shown to sometimes make potions on the fly or beforehand as a safety measure in case her spells fail, seen when she made a healing potion when her magic wasn’t working very well. She even tries to experiment and create potions without knowing what they do. Cherry was the one that made the base of a potion to stop her sister's evil counterpart from taking over Wind's body completely.  

'''Teleportation spell:''' Cherry has the spell that allows her to teleport: However, she can only teleport a certain radius and cannot spam the spell, which would result in fatigue-like symptoms and dizziness. 

'''Perception spell:''' During her time studying, Cherry learns a perception spell that can help her detect anyone in a certain radius. In order to work the spell, she must concentrate intensely to find any one she's detecting or the spell will break. She has proven to be vulnerable when performing the spell because of the intense focus it requires. 

'''Shrinking spell:''' Using a dew leaf and a chant, Cherry is able to shrink objects to a size she so desires. However, she must crush the dew leaf and place or throw it in the direction of the person or object. She only used this spell once when she was a kid, using it to customize two swords for her and Wind.  

'''Invisibility spell:''' Eat a small handful of birch bark and hold onto anyone or object to turn you and them invisible. You must focus on keeping the spell going until the threat goes away.  The amount of time you can stay invisible depends on the strength of the user.  

'''Temporary barrier:''' Cherry is able to create a temporary barrier around her or another person that can last multiple hits at once. However, the amount of durability the barrier can handle depends on her strength. Cherry has used her barrier spell on many occasions, one example being when she was helping her friends fight Sheba, their friend Blyeth's evil true form.  

== Equipment ==
'''Sword:''' Cherry when she was a little kid, decided to personalize two Dawnbloom swords for her and her sister Windflower. This was a medium sized weapon she used to fight in most of her battles. She usually switches between using spells and using her sword in different scenarios.

'''Crimson Bow:''' Though she rarely uses it, she does know how to use a bow. The only times she has used it was when she was trying to hunt animals when she was hiding from the Black Sun.

== Weaknesses ==
'''Overuse:''' Just like other demons and magic users, one of her main weaknesses is overuse of her magic, either her healing powers or spells. Since her bigger or longer spells take more energy, if she uses them for too long she will become very dizzy and even collapse from exhaustion. 

'''Overprotectiveness:''' After losing her mother, she has become overprotective of her little sister, Windflower. Cherry is constantly with her anywhere she goes to ensure that she is protected from harm in any shape or form. When the two of them are separated, she worries about her so much that she loses focus and panics, nervous about the thought of losing the last connection to her family. 

'''PTSD:''' Cherry is prone to having horrible flashbacks of when she was captured by the Black Sun whenever they are mentioned or when she sees someone in a situation reminding her of her capture. She also gets flashbacks from when her mother had sacrificed herself in order to save her and her sister.

'''Easy to Anger:''' Cherry's main weak point is her anger; She has shown to get angered or offended during a conversation about her sister or in a big argument. Cherry has to try to stay calm and resolve the argument when Bolt was threatening to disband Team Voltage many years ago. Cherry also got very angry when Veena told her that she was overprotective of Windflower, leading to an argument. Cherry also can lose her temper around enemies when they harm her friends or sister. Although, Cherry learned to control her anger slowly but surely. 

== Relationships ==

=== Windflower Amana ===
Cherry and Wind have had a sisterly sibling bond ever since they were kids, taking care and trying to protect each other til the very end. They even fight in a duo just like Yuna and Shay Hanamura, with Cherry using her sword, and Wind using her powers. The two of them eventually made a discovery that they can use their swords together in a wind spin attack in a fight.

Ever since they had to escape from their village, Cherry and Wind had to rely on each other in order to survive. This was when Cherry actually taught Wind more basic spells she can use along with her magic. One of them would go out safely for herbs for food, while the other would protect the cave they were sheltered in and keep a lookout for Black Sun members. Then every hour they would teleport back to the cave and report their progress.

=== Luna Amana ===
Cherry had a close bond with her mother, as she was taught how to do basic healing from her in the first place. Luna was also the one to encourage her into spell casting when she noticed her watching spell classes from the window. Many years before the events of the roleplay, Cherry somewhat felt like Luna was hiding something after she found out her father was evil, but shrugged it off.

During the main events of the roleplay, Cherry still had Luna’s words she told her about her father, making her wonder about who her father really was. Cherry kept trying to forget what happened to Luna and the sacrifice she made to save her and Windflower, but every little thing mentioned about the Black Sun would trigger that flashback moment. To make things worse, her memories of being captured by [[Shizuka Ikami]] of the Black Sun would also trigger if it was mentioned as well. 

=== Kazimieras Easton ===
When Cherry was born, she never had the opportunity to meet her father. All she knew from her mother was that he was an evil man that left the family for an unknown reason. 

=== Soul Kawasaki ===
Way before Team Voltage was disbanded, Cherry and Soul kinda had an on and off friendship with each other because of how opposite his personality was to hers and Wind's. it was only until after he admitted that he liked her sister was when they started to have a close friendship. The three of them made an amazing trio during missions with fighting, with Cherry healing, and her sister and Soul fighting together as the offense. While they were isolated from the others, they still were close friends but had a wedge in between them because of Cherry's growing overprotectiveness. They still cared for each other, like when Cherry was worried about Soul when he didn't come back from visiting Ashton in Lyakon. She only found out what really happend to him during Locaster and the other's fight against [[Cassian Packard]] and [[Akuji Hasegawa]], where Cassian told Loc in his own way that he was killed. Cherry, who was hiding during that time, had to keep her feelings in so that she wouldn't get caught. After freeing them and escaping together was when she finally had time to grieve for her old friend. 

=== Locaster Helios ===
Loc was the first person to trust Cherry when she first joined the group Team Voltage many years ago. 



== Trivia ==

* Cherry fangirls over [[Yuna Hanamura]] when she watches her make potions, wanting to learn spells and making potions from her,
* Despite being half Polish and half Latvian, she’s more on her father’s side, who is Latvian.
* Cherry’s original age used to be fifteen before it was changed to nineteen.
* Cherry rarely kept her hair down, mostly because it would get in her face and might be a hassle while doing spells.
* Cherry’s father was originally going to be part of the Black Sun, but instead said that he left the family because he was evil.
* The chants in some of the spells Cherry uses is in latvian, her language. 
* Cherry is more of a defensive fighter than an offense fighter.
* Cereza in spanish means cherry.
* The inspiration for Cherry's discovery on the combination of healing and spirit magic is from this show called The Legend of Korra
* Back when I created Cherry, I at first named her after the colour i made her animal model. Which was a cherry red colour. Then it was because of her cherry red hair in her human model.

      <text bytes="5082" sha1="5w0z4u3pthcz6q2dzszffe9s3srlzlg" xml:space="preserve">''This page belongs to Auryze and is still being worked on. Please do not edit or modify this page without their permission first.''{{Kingdom Info|title1=Azuren|Location=Northernmost part of Lyakvat|govtype=Autocratic absolute monarchy&lt;br&gt;Parliamentary constitutional monarchy&lt;br&gt;Chiefdom &lt;small&gt;(formerly)&lt;/small&gt;|HOF=Kingdom Council|Inhabiters=Locaster Helios, Soul Kawasaki, Cherry Amana, Wind Amana, Veena Lu, Hikage Ishuko, Nabi Haluška, Fēng Xu, Ashton Khanh, Hideko Inazuma, Shizuka Ikami, Damion Halloreen, Crow Watanabe|image1=Azuren Flag.png}}

'''Azuren''' is a country in the world of Lyakvat and is also the main setting of a Good Vs. Evil Roleplay. It is one of the worlds many countries and the largest out of all of them, being a transcontinental country that borders Lyarik to the east near its southern desolates and Soraya to its eastern forest. 

Historically, Azuren had many troubles of who had full control over the land. Many tribes that were created used to rule peacefully, but had troubles with trying to control the rest of the land, which were owned by other tribes besides their own, specifically demon tribes that had begun to travel to find a safer place. As a result, the disputes over the land caused the war between humans and demons, resulting in discrimination in demons and how they had managed to win against the tribes. The tribes, realizing that no one could truly own the land, decided to unite the areas they once controlled and made Azuren, also known by them as the "Azure Land." The tribes had continued to rule for a long time before disbanding.

Azuren has faced rapid industrialization, leading to a technological renaissance for a short period of time. However, during their renaissance also came many wars and a decline in their spirituality, along with more imperialist ambitions and motives. With their new motives set, they went on to take over Lyarik, which was then called Illyria, and many other nations prior, causing many conflicts and wars, including between the kingdoms. 

== History ==

=== Creation ===
Azuren was said to be created by the sun goddess, Uma, and the moon god, Callisto, after merging together to become what is now the world of Lyakvat in order to grant the wish of making a land that would bring peace and prosperity. When they merged, many tribes from an island that was surrounded by only water began migrating over to the new world that was created, the main ones being the Orisians, the Skuas, the Alokans, and the Shias. As tribes begun to settle, they each claimed a portion of the land and made a treaty between all four tribes, saying that they cannot conquer more land from other tribes in the area and that all are equal. 

The treaty was in effect for fifteen years after the creation of Azuren before the Shias, one of the many tribes, had started to expand their territories unbeknownst to the other tribes. the Alokans, one of the Shias ally tribes, had noticed the expansion on the land and alerted the other members. When alerted, the tribes suddenly got into a conflict with the Shias for taking over other tribes land. The leader of the Shias, angered that the Alokan leader had betrayed them, annulled the treaty and begun taking over more of the land. 

=== Troubles between the Tribes ===
As the Shias begun to take over, the four other tribes still stuck by the treaty that they created. Tensions between the Shias and the Alokans were starting to arise, but the Orisians and Skua's attempted to calm things down, even threatening to launch an attack on the Shias, resulting in them backing down from the Alokans. The conflict further erupted when the Shias begun to take over tribes owned by demons, who had settled within the northern territories in order to start a new life, causing a war between the humans and demons. Because of the severe conflict, the other tribes were forced to intervene because of the mass damage coming towards their land. Because of the magic and powers demons possessed, the demons subsequently won the war and defeated the tribes, even their most advanced warriors.

Upholding the shame of the defeat, the tribes suddenly harbored an immense hatred for the demons, despite them only fighting off the tribes to keep control of their land. As the tribes had vanished, the conflict further arose and the other tribes had also broken off the treaty, fighting over the land and attempting to claim leadership. The Orisians and the Skuas had started to fight with one another, leading to chaos with the other tribes. Three other tribes would fight over the northern land and the others fought for the other parts in order to gain power. As the conflict started to worsen, the tribes started to decrease in population and the occupation of the land started to effect the tribes because of the constant wars.    

As the wars begun to continue, three other tribes were fighting over land in northern Azuren and having the same problems as the other tribes were having.

      <text bytes="901" sha1="g2c05siqodw51mn44joi7sacpf04bso" xml:space="preserve">== Introduction ==
Hi! My name's Amina, and welcome to my profile! I've been playing Animal Jam (AJ) since 2017, and I still go on aj to this day to roleplay and hang out with my online friends. I made my first article as a collab with my friend Auryze using a character I made named Cherry. I might do more in the future once I get all the info I need for my characters and have motivation to do it.

I'm actually a part of my friend's story, check out his profile to see more info. 

== Hobbies/interests ==

* Video games; I'm a nintendo switch gamer that loves to play as a form of entertainment
* Writing; I started to make a few stories in the setting of some of the games i've played in September 2022 . (ex; Splatoon 3, miitopia)
* Creating ocs; I made MANY characters from some of my stories, and some have complex backstories
* Anime
* drawing
* Roleplaying in aj :)
* Legend of zelda series</text>

    <title>Non-Members</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
    <id>162375</id>
    <revision>
      <id>258580</id>
      <parentid>258579</parentid>
      <timestamp>2023-09-03T06:26:03Z</timestamp>
      <contributor>
        <username>RosyBecca54</username>
        <id>53430140</id>
      </contributor>
      <origin>258580</origin>
      <model>wikitext</model>
      <format>text/x-wiki</format>
      <text bytes="1012" sha1="hluiwyl8p5gzjdyjo1o8qvg9o6vclyh" xml:space="preserve">[[Category:Tragedy]]
 
[[Category:Sad]]
 
[[Category:Short Stories]]
 
[[Category:Suspense]]
 
[[Category:Emotional]]
 
[[Category:Drama]]
[[Category:Character Death]]
 
[[Category:Bullying]]
 
[[Category:Moral]]
 
= Warning!: This story  includes blood, physical and verbal bullying. Proceed at your own risk =

== Blurb ==
Meet Precious, an average student in Animal Jam…


An average non-member in a mostly member jammer school.


Every day, she suffered teasing from others, friends she once know changing into members one by one.


Take a look at her life, from bad…


To even worse.

&lt;code&gt;{Inspired by [[I Hate Myself - An Animal Jam Story|I Hate Myself]], [[A Living Nightmare (OLD!)|A Living Nightmare]] and various other bullied to death stories}&lt;/code&gt;

== Characters ==

Precious Stone

Duke Stone

Belle Stone

Buckwheat Stone

Honey Mclinne

Tracey Mclinne

Slick Wessar

Pablo Wessar

Cookie Weller

Fetch Thomas

== Chapter 1 ==</text>

== Content Warnings ==
As this is a creepypasta, elements of horror are implemented for the sake of the story. In these you can see

Mentions of a (fictional) murdered individual, specifically that of a seven year old girl

Blood (mentioned decently heavily)

Unsettling Myths (Similar to vampires, key element)

Unethical Medical Elements

And other possible unsettling elements.

IF YOU DO NOT WISH TO EXPERIENCE THESE THINGS, CLICK OFF.

== School Sabertooth ==
You never realize what goes wrong until it does.

Now let’s start simple here. I’ve played Animal Jam since 2014, right before the golden era. As of today, I’ve played for 7 years, on August 22nd, 2021 but I’ve never really encountered anything like this. Yeah sure, I’ve heard of Fman and Wretchedjungle stealing your items, but I was never really rare. They never scared me.

However, in my area, we have local myths. I’d never worried about them until today. For context, there is a place in my area, that around the time I joined the game on mobile, Play Wild, I’d been sent to. I’ve gotten some odd Jam-a-grams from a buddy I’ve been concerned about involving similar aspects to the myths, but today really settled in why I was so unsettled. I’ve had this buddy since 2018, early 2018 to be exact.

About my local myth, the creatures are called the Wayward Bloodstealers, and they supposedly disguise themselves as people and run places that are supposedly for people who want good influences for their kids when they have mental health or behavioral issues. They’ll draw way too much blood in attempts to test you, but that gets debunked when you notice that kids there saw the vials from blood they drew from said kids, empty with a bit of residue, the person holding it often coming from the staff lounge or office. You’ll see why I mentioned these soon enough.

It had been a rough day at school, with kids going crazy, but it WAS the first day after all. My friend, who had went to the place the myth originated from recently, had stated there had been a staff member asking what I liked. They apparently wanted to hear all about me since xe had mentioned me in a “therapy” session. They are a big information sharer. Xe mentions things way too much, and is deemed a “Basic TMI Reminder kid” by my school. We’re teenagers, by the way. My friend in question is 15 and I am also 15. We are sophomores.

I thought nothing of it until I logged onto Animal Jam to receive a buddy request. It was a pink sabertooth with sea star glasses (the pink variant), and a couple other items I can’t quite recall. I accept most buddy requests, so I buddied them. They asked me to go to a school RP with them. Nothing much, right?

I couldn’t really tell you much about the start, just a normal school. They were a bit of a clingy buddy. I got a Jam-a-gram from the buddy I’ve been concerned about. “You should get off and unbuddy her.” They sent. I responded with a “Why?” but continued to rp. It got to the point when the School RP had a “Prom” of sorts, and the sabertooth asked me to teach her to dance. I said “Sure,” and taught her a couple moves in RP. My screen flashed for a couple of seconds, which I thought of as unusual. 

I got another Jam-a-Gram. “You’re safer offline. It’s looking for you. Unbuddy that sabertooth.” A bit ominous, but I supposed it was a joke. I kept doing the prom things as usual, before I noticed something off about the sabertooth model. The eyes were a blood red. It wasn’t an AJ color preset, so I thought she used the color coordinator. She was nonmember though. Maybe a glitch? She asked to dance with me. “I’m not sure if I want to do that,” I responded. My screen flashed with the words “DANCE WITH ME” in all caps, in a grotesque pink color, like that of uncooked meat.

One more Jam-a-Gram. “It’s been nice knowing you, pal.” I was shocked. How did my buddy know what was going on. I heard scratching outside, and looked out the window, but it was just our dog Princess wanting inside. Looking back at my screen, there was a bloody mess. My animal, a deer wearing blue furry arm cuffs, a RIM Jamaaliday gift ribbon, a blue flower crown, and ice armor, was doing the sleep emote in a pool of blood. There were rip marks from claws. Shutting off my tablet, I locked my door and closed the curtains of my window.

I couldn’t sleep that night. The next morning, I walked downstairs and was greeted by my mother. “You are not going to school today. There are reports that a seven year old girl had died by a mauling, found with no blood. Police said it looked like no animal they’ve ever seen.”

Taking the day, I opened up Animal Jam, curious to see if I had misremembered the night. I was using a different animal, my fox, which was one of the other three animals I had. I supposed I misremembered last night, until getting a Jam-a-gram from the concerning buddy. “I saw the news. Good job on staying alive.”

It was in that moment I realized that I had just survived the attack of what I hadn’t thought was real.

= ~Cats &amp; Dogs: A Tale of Romance and Cliche~ =
Not so long ago, cats and dogs lived in peace and harmony, until the cats became greedy and started a war with the dogs. 

They later won and ruled the land. While the cats were rich and threw parties almost everyday, the dogs lived in shabby houses in slums and had little money to live.

Having enough of her father planning marriages for her, Princess Cassidy escapes from her castle.

Maurice struggles from his poor family, and wishes one day the dogs can be separated from the evil cats’ rule.

When the two of them meet in the border in the forest one day, love will blossom and rules shall be broken.

'''''This story is finished. Book 2: Love is in the Air is Coming Out Soon! Stay tuned!'''''

==Characters==

=== Maurice ===
protagonist 1, a peasant dog who mainly helps his brother pick mushrooms, occasionally spy on Princess Cassidy picking flowers

=== Cassidy ===
protagonist 2, the eldest Royal Princess and future Queen, yet hates her royal life and wants to be normal   

=== Charmaine ===
Royal Guard, calm and stern, is always annoyed by Opal but never scolds her 

=== Opal ===
Royal Guard, slightly dorky and panics a lot, revealing the evil plans of King Dusk on attacking their hometown by mistake 

=== Sophie ===
youngest Princess of the Cats, a plain idiot who just follows King Dusk’s orders until his defeat 

=== The Mice (Nina, Mac &amp; Squeakers) ===
knows the best around town, helps Cassidy find the Abandoned Dungeon where Charmaine and Opal are in 

=== Oleander ===
Cassidy’s arranged mate who’s two years younger, doesn’t want to be married to her 

=== King Dusk ===
Evil King of The Cats 

=== Slick &amp; Meadow ===
twins, publisher of the newspaper in both Barksville and Catanoia 

=== Dougie ===
Maurice’s brother, died due to the war during Ep.2 

=== Mayor Crescent ===
the town mayor in Barksville 

=== The Spider Gang (Ingrum, Charlotte, Cobb, Hairy) ===
a group of shady spider merchants who sells sticky spiderwebs, which are King Dusk’s secret attack weapons. Ingrum is King Dusk’s assistant 

==Ep.1 A Forbidden Crush==
Maurice: A brand new day, and I have to do my duties…things are kinda hard after that terrible war-oh why did I forget to introduce myself! I’m Maurice, an ordinary brown peasant dog in the town of Barksville. Me and my big brother Doug has been living here for years, and it does get a bit boring sometimes!

Doug: Brother! Where are you up to? Spying on the girls or pick mushrooms?

Maurice: Walking around, I’m bored.

Doug: Fine, do your own thing, but remember the mushrooms, they’re our dinner!

Maurice: (nods, then leaves)

[At the forest, Maurice sees a bunch of fancy-looking cats picking flowers, among them was a lovely purple mottled she-cat.]

Maurice: Princess Cassidy, my crush, yet we could never be together. Just look at me, I’m nothing but in rags while she’s a Princess!

[Camera turns to the flower-picking cats]

Sophie: Cass, you know it, Father wants you to marry someone and be queen soon.

Cassidy: But what if I don’t want to get married to someone I don’t even know! Who is the suitor this time?

Tabitha: Uh…it’s Sir Tauri, your majesty. There’s not so many options left since you’ve kicked out so many.

Cassidy: (slaps her own face) I said I don’t wanna get married!

Pepper: Well happy for you at least.

Cassidy: Do you even get what I mean? I thought Sophie’s the only one dumb here.

Sophie: Cass! Mind your words!

Fiona: Have you heard of the attacks from the other kingdoms? There’s a recent one last week.

Sophie: I hope your suitors don’t have to go to war for this.

Cassidy: (annoyed) I DON’T EVEN WANT A SUITOR!

[Maurice’s POV, peeking at the girls from the bushes nearby]

Maurice: Oh how I wish I could have gotten more closer to her…it’s just against the law to have any contact with a cat unless at war…(sighs)

[Scene changes to the Catanoia Royal Palace]

King Dusk: Cassidy dear, we need to talk.

Cassidy: Ugh! Yes?

King Dusk: Because of the attacks recently, I have to go out to lead the war-WHY ARE YOU LEAVING?

Cassidy: I don’t even care about you leaving, it’s just so tiresome that all I do are royal duties and suitors. I’m just tired, father, from all this.

King Dusk: It’s not an option, while I leave, you stay here to protect the kingdom.

[King Dusk leaves]

Cassidy: I hate my life.

Pepper: Anything wrong, your majesty?

Cassidy: Just…leave me alone.

[Maurice’s POV]

Maurice: You know Princess Cassidy’s getting married soon?

Dougie: So what?

Maurice: I don’t know, just feeling bad for her to be forced to marry someone she doesn’t know.

Dougie: Who even cares anyway, those cats killed our parents in the war! You know that! Get back in mushroom picking before the cat soldiers come and take us as slaves for war!

Maurice: Yes!

==Ep.2 The War of the Cats &amp; Dogs ==
Maurice: Doug, I’m back! Doug? Brother?

Dakota: He’s taken by the cats!

Maurice: WHAT?!

Honeycomb: And he won’t come back until the war’s over.

Maurice: (thinks) I need to find him. (Runs off)

[The battlefield, with lots of dead bodies. Maurice can still spot Dougie on the ground]

Maurice: DOUG! Please, don’t leave me here!

Hugo: What’s up with all this commotion?

Maurice: (in tears) Doug…he’s dead.

Spirit: Maurice! We’re supposed to stay at the village, now what?

Tala: Sir, we have to leave him be, that’s what the rules said.

Maurice: You can’t do this! He’s my brother, my best friend!

[Meanwhile]

Cassidy: Father, what have you done! Many have died in this war already! You’re not-

King Dusk: SHUT UP! Sir Tauri and several others are severely injured so we’re going to assign you a new husband, perhaps the last on the list: (sighs) Oleander the Timid…

Cassidy: Oleander?! No, not him! I only treat him like a friend, not a future husband! And are you insane? He’s literally two years younger than me! Do you just expect me to be a wife of a literal child?! I’m 18 already!

King Dusk: NO BUTS! YOU WILL MARRY HIM NEXT WEEK! DON’T YOU DARE RAISE YOUR VOICE AT ME, YOUNG LADY!

[King Dusk leaves Cassidy’s room, Cassidy watches the battlefield and sighs.]

Cassidy: I can’t stand it anymore, I have to leave tonight.

[At night, Cassidy sneaks out of the palace in a peasants clothes. She passes through the border and sneaks into a nearby cottage.]

[Inside, Maurice is ready for bed when he hears a loud thump.]

Maurice: Who’s that? I need to check out.

[He looks around. A hooded silhouette just landed through the window, it takes the hood off to reveal a purple mottled cat with a princess tiara.]

Maurice: Princess Cassidy?! How-How are you here?

Cassidy: Hiding from my father, idiot! Wait-you’re a dog! Oh dear, what have I gotten myself into?!

[Maurice watches in surprise as Cassidy throws her tiara away.]

Maurice: What are you doing? Aren’t you a royal?

Cassidy: Enough weird questions, I’m staying at your house.

Maurice: …WHAT-

==Ep.3 Childhood Buddies==
Maurice: Cassidy, I know you’re a princess and you might hate it, but we only have berries and mushrooms here.

Cassidy: MUSHROOMS?! Oh dear heavens, I thought you at least have something else!

Maurice: Yeah, but we’re too poor to buy other types of food.

Cassidy: I’ll tell Father when I go back, about how awful life is here!

Maurice: Didn’t you say you’re avoiding him and that’s why you’re here?

Cassidy: Yeah…the war has really separated the both of us, have we?

Maurice: ?

Cassidy: I remember we used to play together when we’re children! I have proof! (walks towards the photos on the walls and points at a purple kitten right next to childhood Maurice) See?

Maurice: WE USED TO BE PLAYMATES?!

Cassidy: Yeah! But Father hated you dogs, and waged a war 10 years ago, when I was 8 and Mother was sick. I’ve never seen you since…until now!

[Trumpet noises outside]

Maurice: Must be the mayor, there must be news.

[Maurice puts a dog beret on Cassidy’s head and pulled her to the town square.]

Mayor Crescent: Hello everyone! It is with great sadness that most of our townsmen are forced to join and have died during the recent war with Horse County. And Princess Cassidy of Catanoia is currently missing, after Sir Tauri is severely injured and she is assigned a new mate for the upcoming wedding next week with Oleander, son of the Mountain Cats. This marriage will supposedly unite the Mountain Tribe and Catanoia, if you see Princess Cassidy, please report to us immediately.

[At the market]

Maurice: Everyone’s looking for you, you sure you’re still staying?

Cassidy: Of course! I don’t want my life to be planned out like my sister Sophie, I just want to be a normal citizen! I don’t want to marry Oleander, I don’t want to get married yet!

Maurice: Hmm…we’ll figure that out soon.

Cassidy: I’ll go back to the cottage and think.

[Maurice watches as Cassidy leaves, he suddenly notices two silvery figures walking around in the crowd. Assuming them as guards, he runs towards Cassidy.]

Maurice: Cassidy! The guards!

[The two figures spot them and chases after them, they ran back to the cottage and the two figures pounded on the door. Cassidy hid in Maurice’s bedroom while Maurice peeked out the door.]

Charmaine: Sir, have you seen Princess Cassidy?

Opal: We’re only here to look for her and protect her from any danger, we don’t mean any harm.

==Ep.4 The Truth of the King==
Maurice: What are you doing?

Opal: We’re on your side, sir.

Maurice: Our side?

Opal: We’re umm…suspicious of the king!

Charmaine: Opal! We can’t tell that much to a peasant!

Opal: He’s planning to attack our hometown! He’s gonna kill us Persian Cats! Don’t believe him! We need help!

Charmaine: OPAL! THAT’S NOT WHAT WERE SUPPOSED TO DO!

Opal: Sorry, Charmaine. It’s just I can’t see my friends in my town getting burnt alive.

Maurice: Maybe we can help you, but I’m not sure if I should trust you guys.

Charmaine: We can keep an eye on him, and you can still take care of Cass. We won’t take her away, we’re only worried.

Maurice: …Ok? Cassidy can help too, right?

Charmaine &amp; Opal: (nods)

Maurice: Cassidy!

[Cassidy peeps out the cottage door]

Cassidy: What’s up?

Maurice: Can you keep secrets?

Cassidy: Yeah, why? Oh, Opal, Charmaine! Why are you-

Opal: They’re proclaiming war at Persian Town!

Cassidy: Persian Town’s supposed to be revolting and attacking us, isn’t it?

Charmaine: No, Cass. You must listen, your father’s proclaiming war on US.

Cassidy: That’s impossible!

Maurice: You can still keep an eye, right?

Cassidy: I don’t know who to trust, but I’ll try to spy on him as much as I can.

Maurice: It’s getting late, you guys should go.

Charmaine: It’s safe with us, sir!

[Cassidy takes a stroll in the woods when she hears King Dusk talking to some spiders]

King Dusk: Ready?

Ingrum: Yes, your majesty.

Charlotte: So we’re attacking in three days?

Cobb: No, in a week!

Hairy: Three days, Cobb! We’re gonna sneak attack the Persians with our webs!

Cassidy: (whispers) I need to tell Maurice! We need to stop Father!

== Ep.5 Fireworks &amp; Sparks ==
Cassidy: Maurice! Father’s planning to bombard Persian Town with spiderwebs in three days!

Maurice: Ok then! To the border!

Cassidy: But we can’t go-

Maurice: You came here through the border right?

Cassidy: Yeah…

[At the border, the couple meets up with the Royal Guard duo]

Opal: Any news?

Cassidy: Father’s planning a sneak attack with spiderwebs on your town in three days-no-TWO DAYS!

Charmaine: I knew that king is up to no good!

Cassidy: And he’s making deals with SPIDERS!

Charmaine: The Spider Gang? And their leader should be…Ingrum, right? Opal?

Opal: Yes, Ingrum’s team sells extremely sticky spiderwebs. We’re doomed!

Charmaine: There is a tunnel for us to get to your township, but it’s narrow and it’ll take days to get everyone from Persian Town to here!

Opal: We’ll think of something, Charmaine. Don’t fret.

Maurice: What about us?

Cassidy: Still spying on the king?

Opal &amp; Charmaine: Yes! We’ll meet up here tomorrow!

[Back at the town, Maurice gives a detailed tour for Cassidy, but she seems upset.]

Maurice: What’s wrong?

Cassidy: It’s just…I hate Father, but I can’t believe he would do such a thing!

Maurice: I can cheer you up! There’s a fireworks festival tonight!

Cassidy: What?

Maurice: The Annual Barksville Fireworks Festival! You’ve never heard of that?

Cassidy: No, we’ve never have one in Catanoia, Father has banned all use of them.

Maurice: Oh, no wonder you hate him! He’s ruining all the fun!

Cassidy: (giggles)

[At night, Cassidy and Maurice watch the fireworks festival. The night sky is filled with all sorts of colours.]

Cassidy: Maurice, this is the best firework show EVER!

Maurice: Told you it’s awesome!

[At the forest background, a young spider, Charlotte notices the couple. She heads towards a crowd of other spiders. On the highest tree branch was Ingrum, who gracefully falls on a web in the middle.]

Charlotte: Ma’am, our plan’s complete.

Ingrum: I’ll tell King Dusk, she’ll get what she deserves.

Charlotte: She?

Ingrum: Yes, it’s a she.

[The spiders leaves with the bristling of the leaves.]

Cassidy: Who’s that?

Maurice: What?

Cassidy: Nothing!

Maurice: You must be thinking too much, let’s go home after the show ends.

== Ep.6 Well, That’s Gonna be a Problem ==
Maurice: Morning, Cassidy!

Cassidy: You can just call me Cass, that’s what  everyone in the Palace calls me.

Maurice: Ok, should we go meet the Royal Guards?

Cassidy: Let’s go!

[They run to the border, where Charmaine and Opal are…hiding?]

Maurice: What are you-

Opal: (whisper) Hush! They blocked the tunnels!

Charmaine: Both your kingdom and our town are guarded now!

Cassidy: I remember what they said last night!

Everyone: Who?

Cassidy: Father wants to get revenge on someone, but who? It might be me: for leaving the kingdom, or someone else!

Maurice: Whoever it is, I don’t think it’s gonna end well.

Opal: The attack’s in a day and we still haven’t evacuated everyone!

Charmaine: I guess we have to…(sighs) go with the flow.

Cassidy: No! We can’t let my kingdom destroy you for no reason!

Maurice: I can get help, the dogs are really helpful here.

Charmaine: But they won’t believe us, we’re cats!

[Suddenly, King Dusk, the Spider Gang and many soldiers appear out of nowhere.]

King Dusk: What is going on here?

Cassidy: Father, stop all this nonsense!

King Dusk: Charmaine, Opal, you have put your families and friends in front of your duties!  Take them away!

[Charmaine and Opal squeal in horror as they’re tangled up in webs.]

Cassidy: Father! You can’t do this! They don’t deserve it.

King Dusk: Princesses don’t feel pity for traitors.

Cassidy: Father, please reconsider! They don’t mean it!

[King Dusk and his soldiers leave with Charmaine and Opal.]

Ingrum: Princess Cassidy, King Dusk wants you to come home.

Cassidy: (angry) I WILL NOT GO ANYWHERE! I HATE YOU, FATHER!

Charlotte: Uh-

Cobb: You-

Cassidy: A princess shall escort herself!

[Cassidy pulls Maurice by the hand and they dart back to the township. The townsfolk look angry as they arrived the town square.]

Tala: Maurice! What have you done?! Keeping the Royal Princess?! Helping Persian Town?!

Maurice: I-I can explain!

Spirit: Explain?! Why can’t the “princess” explain herself?

Cassidy: You won’t believe it, but Father’s evil! He’s gonna bombard Persian Town with SPIDERWEBS without any reason!

Hugo: Whatever! Maurice, get out of your stupid fantasies and take her back to where she belongs!

Maurice: You’re not listening to the truth, guys! Ugh! I gotta go! Cassidy?

Cassidy: How ignorant! Maurice, I need to find Father to negotiate, or convince him.

Maurice: Sure, but be safe!

[Maurice leaves the town square and return to the cottage while Cassidy crosses the border and barges in the Royal Palace again.]

Cassidy: Father!

King Dusk: I can’t believe you’re doing this! You’re wrecking the kingdom!

Cassidy: I’m only here to-

King Dusk: You’re going back to your bedroom, NOW!

Cassidy: But, Father, I-

King Dusk: Get back in your bedroom, I will check on you from time to time. Don’t you dare try to leave, future Queen.

[Back in the cottage, Maurice is still worried, so he also crossed the border and finds Cassidy, who’s up on her bedroom balcony.]

Maurice: CASS!

Cassidy: MAURICE!

[They hugged in joy.]

Cassidy: What are we going to do? Father wouldn’t listen!

Maurice: We’ll free them, I promise!

Cassidy: What about the townsfolk-

Maurice: I know just the way to do so.

Cassidy: What?

Maurice: Hold my hand.

[Cassidy does what she’s told.]

Maurice: Jump.

== Ep.7 The Mice’s Assistance ==
[The couple jumps and lands on a pile of leaves.]

Maurice: Now we need to free your Royal Guard friends! King Dusk locked them up in the dungeon, right?

Cassidy: (nods, then shakes head) Yes, then he moved them.

Maurice: How?

Cassidy: That’s what the maids said while I was going back to my bedroom.

Maurice: Where is it?

Cassidy: (mysteriously) The Abandoned Dungeon.

Maurice: What are we waiting for, let’s go!

[They arrive at the deep parts of the forest.]

Cassidy: There’s one problem, I have no idea where it is.

Maurice: Why couldn’t you tell me earlier, now what?

???: Follow us!

Cassidy: What are you?

???: We heard your plea, your majesty. The Maids can’t come, so we’re sent instead.

[Three small mice popped out from the bushes.]

Nina: Follow us.

Squeakers: We’ll take you there.

[The couple followed the mice to the Abandoned Dungeon. King Dusk, Ingrum, Charmaine, and Opal are there.]

Charmaine: You can’t do this to us!

King Dusk: Don’t get carried away. My daughter will find you, but I’m gonna relocate you soon.

Opal: You won’t get through us without a sword fight!

Ingrum: Oh, we’ll see about that.

Opal: I will not let you take us, you monster!

King Dusk: Why? Because your town is getting what they deserve!

Charmaine: What did we do to you to deserve this?

Ingrum: Oh, it’s not you, it’s your mother.

Charmaine: Mother? But she’s dead long ago! What did she do to deserve this?

[Ingrum is ready to shoot a web at Charmaine.]

Opal: Don’t you dare!

[Opal was shot instead.]

Ingrum: Oh, that’s a deep friendship!

Charmaine: That’s a knight’s duty, to protect their loved ones!

Ingrum: (stammer) Loved…ones?

Opal: So what?

Ingrum: Whatever! See you tomorrow! Ha!

King Dusk: You won’t be here forever! You’ll be bait for the war!

Charmaine &amp; Opal: WHAT-

[Meanwhile.]

Cassidy: You sure we’re following the right path? It’s been an hour already!

Maurice: I’m hungry!

Nina: I promise you it’s the right path, your majesty.

[Back at the Abandoned Dungeon.]

Charmaine: We’re going to be BAIT FOR THE WAR?! Aren’t you getting serious, Opal?

Opal: Yeah, I guess we’re dead anyways, stuck in a stupid cell.

Charmaine: At least we still have each other-LOOK! IT’S THE MICE!

Nina: Charie!

Mac: Opal!

Squeakers: We brought you buddies!

Maurice: Enough blabbering! Find the lock!

Cassidy: Can you climb up the gates?

Nina: There’s a lock at the top!

Mac: We’re too small!

Squeakers: Oh, I know! Can you stack up together?

[Cassidy and Maurice stacked up together with the mice.]

[Nina unlocks the lock with a hairpin, the three mice open the door together and Charmaine and Opal leaves. With the mice’s help, Opal gets all the sticky webs out of her.]

Opal: No time to lose. Let’s go home!

Cassidy: And stop that war! I’d better confront my father again.

Mac: Again? Seriously, how many times?

Cassidy: The last one, I promise.

== Ep.8 Arranged Marriages ==
[Cassidy and the mice runs off to the castle.]

King Dusk: Princess Cassidy, where have you been? You went looking for them, did you?

Nina: No, your majesty. We’re in the bedroom the whole time.

King Dusk: That’s what I thought.

Cassidy: Why are you so cruel?

King Dusk: I’m only doing for what’s best for us, dear.

Cassidy: Liar! Persian Town’s innocent, you’re the one who started all this! You’re lying, why?

King Dusk: How dare you speak against the King? You’re the liar!

Cassidy: No! You’re lying! I’ve never believed in you after all of this! You’re nothing but a terrible cat!

King Dusk: (mumble) You’re just like your mother.

Cassidy: Mother?

King Dusk: I mean, you’re going on a date tonight with Oleander.

Cassidy: No, Father! I don’t like him! I said that already that I only treat him as a friend!

King Dusk: Don’t worry, you’ll know more about him. I’m sure you’ll love him soon before your wedding and coronation.

Cassidy: But-

King Dusk: NO BUTS! YOU WILL HAVE A DATE WITH HIM TONIGHT!

[Evening, at a fancy restaurant. Cassidy’s in a gorgeous evening gown while Oleander’s in a fancy tuxedo suit.]

Oleander: Uh…I-My stunning princess, I’m so honoured t-to have a date with you and be your future husband. I-I’ve got a nice seat for you, just look at the beautiful scenery of the lake!

[Cassidy is completely uninterested, however.]

Oleander: Shall we eat, umm…my lady?

Cassidy: …Yeah, whatever.

[Meanwhile, Charmaine, Opal and a bunch of confused husky townsfolks from Barksville are looking from someone.]

Prince: You sure the newspaper publishers from both of our kingdoms is coming?

Charmaine: Yes.

Slush: They’re here!

Hunk: Meadow! Slick!

Charmaine: You know most about our kingdoms, do you have anything special about the war?

Meadow &amp; Slick: It’s top secret, we-

Opal: That’s against the rule: Always tell the truth to a knight.

Meadow &amp; Slick: Fine! King Dusk is going to demolish Persian Town, after he get revenge on someone he used to love dearly!

Meadow: We even interviewed the spiders, but they chased us away!

Slick: Then he’s going to kill all the dogs and take over their land!

Opal &amp; Charmaine: Oh no!

The Huskies: We have to tell the others, NOW!

Meadow &amp; Slick: We’ll make the newest papers on it ASAP!

[Back at the restaurant.]

Oleander: You’re not looking at me, p-princess. Why? Are you sad?

Cassidy: (upset) Hmph!

Oleander: Uh-Because you’re forced to join this date?

Cassidy: Olly, what do you mean “forced to”?

Oleander: You don’t love me, right?

Cassidy: (sternly) Yes.

Oleander: Same.

Cassidy: How?

Oleander: We’re just…not meant for each other. I’m in love with a local forest girl, but before I can confess it to her, there’s a war between the Mountain Tribe and Catanoia. I’m forced to marry you to make peace, but I want to be with her, not you-I’m sorry, did I…say too much? Does it hurt?

Cassidy: No, it feels better if you tell the truth, anyway.

Oleander: Who do you like then?

Cassidy: I’m in love with a peasant dog, though I’m sure it’s against the rules…but I see we both have similarities. Let’s leave, and tell those ones how much we loved them.

Oleander: Yes, my p-princess!

Cassidy: You can just call me Cass, like before.

Oleander: Yes, Cass!

[Cassidy and Oleander leave the restaurant, Oleander heads off to the Mountains while Cassidy goes to the cottage, where Maurice is picking berries.]

Cassidy: Maurice! You wouldn’t believe what happened back there. Father forced me to have a date with Oleander!

Maurice: How did it turn out? Horrible?

Cassidy: No! He confessed that he doesn’t want to marry me at all, he likes someone else, just like me!

Maurice: You like someone else?! Who is it?

[Cassidy kisses Maurice on the cheek.]

Cassidy: You.

Maurice: (blushes) That-

[Megaphone trumpet noises]

Maurice: It’s the mayor again! What is it this time?

Cassidy: I guess we have to go to the town square again, huh?

== Ep.9 All is Revealed ==
Meadow: BIG NEWS! BIG NEWS! KING DUSK’S EVIL PLANS ARE REVEALED TODAY!

Slick: GET YOUR LATEST NEWS ON THE WAR OF PERSIAN TOWN TODAY!

Tala: WHAT?! King Dusk’s evil?! That-

Spirit: Of course you think it’s fake, you’re only a baby when the war ended!

The Huskies: Guys, what Slick and Meadow are saying are real, we questioned them with Charmaine and Opal!

Mayor Crescent: Attention everyone! We are going to assist the Persians in today’s war, and lead a rebellion against the king! I repeat, we are going to assist the Persians in today’s war and lead a rebellion against the king!

Hugo: EVERYONE GET TO PERSIAN TOWN RIGHT NOW!!! WE ARE READY TO FIGHT!

== Ep.10 The Rebellion Awaits ==
[Background with webs and everyone screaming.]

Mayor Asher: Please! We did nothing wrong!

Mayor Crescent: Stop attacking both of our towns!

Cassidy: They’ve done nothing to you, you can’t hurt them like this!

King Dusk: I don’t care what you think, you little brat!

Maurice: Stop talking to my girlfriend like that!

King Dusk: You-Cats and Dogs can’t date, that’s against the law!

Cassidy: Really? We don’t care, you’ve destroyed the honour of our kingdom for your selfishness!

King Dusk: Like do you think I care? You’re the ones who’s destroying our kingdom, Princess Cassidy! You’re the worst daughter in existence! Why can’t you learn from Sophie?

Mayor Crescent: Daughter?

Cassidy: What do you mean?

Mayor Crescent: Cassandra, is that you?

Cassidy: Only Mother calls me that, and she’s a leopard, there’s no way you’re my mother!

King Dusk: CAN’T YOU SHUT YOUR MOUTH?!

Mayor Crescent: She needs to know the truth!

[Ingrum, sitting on King Dusk’s shoulder shoots a web at Mayor Crescent and Mayor Asher. Mayor Crescent’s hood falls off in the process, revealing her actual cat ears.]

King Dusk: I’m gonna make you suffer from what you made me do.

[All the cat soldier start attacking the place, the Rebellion team tries to stop them but fails.]

Charmaine: (gets stuck in webs) Ah!

Opal: Charie!

Mayor Crescent: Charmaine! Cassandra! You can’t hurt my daughters, you puny spiders!

Charmaine: Mom?!

Cassidy: Wait-if she says that Charmaine and I are her daughters, we’re siblings! Father, I need to know the truth, NOW!!

The Huskies: Mayor Crescent, tell her the truth!

King Dusk: I won’t let you stop me! (points a knife at Charmaine) Stop right now, or I’ll kill her!

Mayor Crescent: No! Charmaine!

King Dusk: Time’s ticking, my queen.

Mayor Crescent: I’ll give in, just let go of her!

[Opal, Maurice and Cassidy run towards Mayor Crescent.]

Maurice: We can’t let both of us surrender like this!

Cassidy: What should we do?

Opal: Ah! I’m so confused!

Mayor Asher: Confront him, and tell everyone the truth.

Opal: Everyone’s fighting and the dogs are breaking everything! What should we do?!

Mayor Crescent: Frights! Even after everything you did to me, I still loved you! Please, just leave us alone!

King Dusk: You have no idea what you’ve put me through, you traitor!

Mayor Crescent: Frights, please!

King Dusk: I’m done trusting you, Crescent, I was done years ago.

Maurice: (with megaphone) MAY I HAVE YOUR ATTENTION?!

Everyone: ?!

Cassidy: Father says the Persians and the Dogs, BUT THEY’RE NOT! I’VE SPENT TIME WITH THEM AND THEY’RE THE NICEST BEINGS ON PLANET EARTH!!

Maurice: (whispers) You don’t have to yell, you know. (through megaphone) And we also learnt that (points at King Dusk) YOU are the one who started the war!

All Persian Cats: And why would WE believe you?

Opal: Guys, we have proof!

Slick &amp; Meadow: You’ve read the newspapers, he’s gonna destroy the dogs and Persian Cats to have the land all to himself!

All Dogs: They’re telling the truth!

Cat Soldiers: Ok-WHAT?!

King Dusk: No! They’re lying! You fox morons!

Mayor Crescent: Frights! You’ve not just taken my throne while I was sick, you’ve even-(coughs) I, as Queen Crescent, the TRUE ruler of Catanoia, shall banish you from this place forever, you must not come back or we’ll tear you to bits!

All Cats: (with pitchforks) Traitor! Traitor!

Persian Cats &amp; Dogs: You don’t even deserve to be our leader! Boo!

[A giant swarm of cats push King Dusk off a slope, sending him rolling, down and down.]

Cassidy: So long, Father!

Sophie: DAD!!!

Cassidy: Sophie, you’re so late! Did you listen to all that? He doesn’t even deserve to be our father!

Sophie: (sobs)

Queen Crescent: Cassandra! Sophia!

Sophie: Mommy!

Cassidy: Mother!

[Queen Crescent hugs the two of them, the looks at Charmaine, who doesn’t look like she’s fond of it.]

Queen Crescent: You can hug me, dear. You know.

Charmaine: Fine…mom. I just thought you were dead all those years ago.

Queen Crescent: I’ll tell you the whole story: your father and I met each other during a royal party and it was like love at first sight, we were soon married but over time, I had to focus on my royal duties as queen and he grew cold and thought I didn’t love him. When I was sick after giving birth to you three, he took care of two of you for me and left the last one for the royal guards. He then banished me to the dogs village, where I was healed and elected as mayor. To this day, I still blame myself for letting him do whatever he wants while I was sick and weak…I would never let him take my kingdom and you ever again.

Cassidy: Don’t cry, Mother. We’re always here together.

Sophie: And I shouldn’t have let Dad control me and start the war.

Charmaine: So what now? The king’s gone and Mother’s still recovering, right?

Cassidy: We can build a new kingdom, with both of the cats and dogs!

Queen Crescent: Yes! And we shall be united once more!

Maurice: Uh…your majesty?

Queen Crescent: What’s the matter?

Maurice: It might be against our rules but Cassidy and I-

Queen Crescent: The kingdom’s now united, and the rules…really need to change. Yes, you can date her. I won’t let the rules define who you are and who you love.

Maurice: Yay! Now what?

Cassidy: Look for new places to explore?

Sophie, Charmaine &amp; Opal: Yes! (runs off, laughing in joy)

Cassidy: Maurice! You coming?

Maurice: In a minute!

[Maurice picks up a small photo of him and Dougie from his pocket.]

Maurice: I hope you’re happy there, we’ve gone through a revolution and we’ve got a brand new kingdom. You’re the best brother I’ve ever had.

[Maurice follows the rest of the characters as a rainbow shines above the sky.]

Narrator: Five months have passed since the events here and things are pretty much in peace. The spiders and insects have joined the kingdom and Ingrum’s team is forgiven for their involvement in King Dusk’s plans. Oleander and his girlfriend he once mentioned are getting married soon and…oh dear, what about Maurice and Cassidy?

Maurice: Cass? Can I show you something?

Cassidy: Ok.

[Maurice takes Cassidy to the balcony where they watched fireworks.]

Cassidy: What are you doing?

Maurice: Will you marry me?</text>

    <title>Phantanimal</title>
    <ns>0</ns>
